word.kjv: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
word.thailand: ขอพระองค์ทรงหันมาทางข้าพระองค์ และมีพระเมตตาต่อข้าพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์ว้าเหว่และเป็นทุกข์อยู่
word.spanish1909: Mírame, y ten misericordia de mí; Porque estoy solo y afligido.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Volgiti a me, ed abbi pietà di me, perch’io son solo ed afflitto.
word.german1912: Wende dich zu mir und sei mir gnädig; denn ich bin einsam und elend.
word.french1910: Regarde-moi et aie pitié de moi, Car je suis abandonné et malheureux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你轉向我，恩待我，因為我孤獨困苦。
word.korean: 주여, 나는 외롭고 괴롭사오니 내게 돌이키사 나를 긍휼히 여기소서
word.tagalog: Panumbalikan mo ako, at maawa ka sa akin; sapagka't ako'y nag-iisa at nagdadalamhati.
word.maori: Tahuri mai ki ahau, tohungia hoki ahau; he mokemoke hoki ahau, e mamae ana te ngakau.
word.cebuano: Lingia ako ug malooy ka kanako; Kay ako biniyaan ug sinakit.
word.hebrew: טז  פנה-אלי וחנני    כי-יחיד ועני אני
word.hebrewmodern: פנה אלי וחנני כי יחיד ועני אני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Hear, O LORD, when I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงสดับเมื่อข้าพระองค์ร้องทูลด้วยเสียงของข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงกรุณาและตรัสตอบข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Oye, oh Jehová, mi voz con que á ti clamo; Y ten misericordia de mí, respóndeme.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus adjutor meus et protector meus ; in ipso speravit cor meum, et adjutus sum : et refloruit caro mea, et ex voluntate mea confitebor ei.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, ascolta la mia voce, io t’invoco; abbi pietà di me, e rispondimi.
word.german1912: HERR, höre meine Stimme, wenn ich rufe; sei mir gnädig und erhöre mich!
word.french1910: Eternel! écoute ma voix, je t'invoque: Aie pitié de moi et exauce-moi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！我發聲呼求的時候，求你垂聽；求你恩待我，應允我。
word.korean: 여호와여, 내가 소리로 부르짖을 때에 들으시고 또한 나를 긍휼히 여기사 응답하소서
word.tagalog: Dinggin mo, Oh Panginoon, pagka ako'y sumisigaw ng aking tinig: maawa ka rin sa akin, at sagutin mo ako.
word.maori: ¶ Whakarongo mai ki toku reo, e Ihowa, ua karanga ahau, tohungia ahau, whakahokia mai hoki he kupu ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Magpatalinghug ka , Oh Jehova, kong magatu-aw ako uban sa akong tingog: Malooy ka usab kanako, ug tubagon mo ako.
word.hebrew: ז  שמע-יהוה קולי אקרא    וחנני וענני
word.hebrewmodern: שמע יהוה קולי אקרא וחנני וענני׃
word.greekot: κύριος βοηθός μου καὶ ὑπερασπιστής μου ἐπ' αὐτῷ ἤλπισεν ἡ καρδία μου καὶ ἐβοηθήθην καὶ ἀνέθαλεν ἡ σάρξ μου καὶ ἐκ θελήματός μου ἐξομολογήσομαι αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Hear, O LORD, and have mercy upon me: LORD, be thou my helper.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงสดับและทรงพระกรุณาต่อข้าพระองค์ ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงเป็นผู้อุปถัมภ์ของข้าพระองค์"
word.spanish1909: Oye, oh Jehová, y ten misericordia de mí: Jehová, sé tú mi ayudador.
word.latinvulgate: Miserere mei, Domine, quoniam tribulor ; conturbatus est in ira oculus meus, anima mea, et venter meus.
word.italian1927: Ascolta, o Eterno, ed abbi pietà di me; o Eterno, sii tu il mio aiuto!
word.german1912: HERR, höre und sei mir gnädig! HERR, sei mein Helfer!
word.french1910: Ecoute, Eternel, aie pitié de moi! Eternel, secours-moi! -
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你垂聽，恩待我；耶和華啊！求你幫助我。”
word.korean: 여호와여, 들으시고 나를 긍휼히 여기소서 여호와여, 나의 돕는 자가 되소서 하였나이다
word.tagalog: Iyong dinggin, Oh Panginoon, at maawa ka sa akin: Panginoon, maging saklolo nawa kita.
word.maori: Whakarongo, e Ihowa, tohungia hoki ahau: e Ihowa, ko koe hei awhina moku.
word.cebuano: Patalinghugi, Oh Jehova, ug malooy ka kanako: Oh Jehova, mahimo ka unta nga magtatabang kanako.
word.hebrew: י  מה-בצע בדמי    ברדתי אל-שחת היודך עפר    היגיד אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: שמע יהוה וחנני יהוה היה עזר לי׃
word.greekot: ἐλέησόν με κύριε ὅτι θλίβομαι ἐταράχθη ἐν θυμῷ ὁ ὀφθαλμός μου ἡ ψυχή μου καὶ ἡ γαστήρ μου

word.kjv: I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy: for thou hast considered my trouble; thou hast known my soul in adversities;
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะเปรมปรีดิ์และยินดีในความเมตตาของพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงทอดพระเนตรความทุกข์ใจของข้าพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงทราบเรื่องความทุกข์ยากแห่งจิตวิญญาณของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Me gozaré y alegraré en tu misericordia; Porque has visto mi aflicción; Has conocido mi alma en las angustias:
word.latinvulgate: Tu es refugium meum a tribulatione quæ circumdedit me ; exsultatio mea, erue me a circumdantibus me.
word.italian1927: Io festeggerò e mi rallegrerò per la tua benignità; poiché tu hai veduta la mia afflizione, hai preso conoscenza delle distrette dell’anima mia,
word.german1912: Ich freue mich und bin fröhlich über deine Güte, daß du mein Elend ansiehst und erkennst meine Seele in der Not
word.french1910: Je serai par ta grâce dans l'allégresse et dans la joie; Car tu vois ma misère, tu sais les angoisses de mon âme,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要因你的慈愛歡喜快樂，因為你看見了我的困苦，知道我心中的痛苦；
word.korean: 내가 주의 인자하심을 기뻐하며 즐거워할 것은 주께서 나의 곤란을 감찰하사 환난 중에 있는 내 영혼을 아셨고
word.tagalog: Ako'y matutuwa at magagalak sa iyong kagandahang-loob: sapagka't iyong nakita ang aking kadalamhatian: iyong nakilala ang aking kaluluwa sa mga kasakunaan:
word.maori: Ka whakamanamana ahau, ka hari ki tou atawhai; mou i titiro ki taku tangi; i matau hoki ki toku wairua i nga wa o te he;
word.cebuano: Mahinangup ako ug magakalipay sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot; Kay nasud-ong mo ang akong kagulanan: Naila mo ang akong kalag nga  anaa sa mga kalisdanan.
word.hebrew: ז  שנאתי השמרים הבלי-שוא    ואני אל-יהוה בטחתי
word.hebrewmodern: אגילה ואשמחה בחסדך אשר ראית את עניי ידעת בצרות נפשי׃
word.greekot: σύ μου εἶ καταφυγὴ ἀπὸ θλίψεως τῆς περιεχούσης με τὸ ἀγαλλίαμά μου λύτρωσαί με ἀπὸ τῶν κυκλωσάντων με διάψαλμα

word.kjv: Have mercy upon me, O LORD, for I am in trouble: mine eye is consumed with grief, yea, my soul and my belly.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงพระกรุณาแก่ข้าพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์กำลังทุกข์ใจ นัยน์ตาของข้าพระองค์ก็ร่วงโรยไปเพราะความระทม ทั้งจิตวิญญาณและร่างกายของข้าพระองค์ด้วย
word.spanish1909: Ten misericordia de mí, oh Jehová, que estoy en angustia: Hanse consumido de pesar mis ojos, mi alma, y mis entrañas.
word.latinvulgate: Nolite fieri sicut equus et mulus, quibus non est intellectus. In camo et freno maxillas eorum constringe, qui non approximant ad te.
word.italian1927: Abbi pietà di me, o Eterno, perché sono in distretta; l’occhio mio, l’anima mia, le mie viscere son rosi dal cordoglio.
word.german1912: HERR, sei mir gnädig, denn mir ist angst; meine Gestalt ist verfallen vor Trauern, dazu meine Seele und mein Leib.
word.french1910: Aie pitié de moi, Eternel! car je suis dans la détresse; J'ai le visage, l'âme et le corps usés par le chagrin.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你恩待我，因為我在患難之中；我的眼睛因愁煩昏花，我的身、我的心也都衰殘。
word.korean: 여호와여 내 고통을 인하여 나를 긍휼히 여기소서 내가 근심으로 눈과 혼과 몸이 쇠하였나이다
word.tagalog: Maawa ka sa akin, Oh Panginoon, sapagka't ako'y nasa kahirapan: ang aking mata ay namumugto sa kapanglawan, oo, ang aking kaluluwa, at aking katawan.
word.maori: ¶ Tohungia ahau, e Ihowa, kei te he hoki ahau, pakoko kau toku mata i te pouri, toku wairua me toku kopu.
word.cebuano: Malooy ka kanako, Oh Jehova, kay ania ako sa kagul-anan: Ginaut-ut sa kasakit ang akong mata, oo, ang akong kalag ug ang akong lawas.
word.hebrew: ט  ולא הסגרתני ביד-אויב    העמדת במרחב רגלי
word.hebrewmodern: חנני יהוה כי צר לי עששה בכעס עיני נפשי ובטני׃
word.greekot: μὴ γίνεσθε ὡς ἵππος καὶ ἡμίονος οἷς οὐκ ἔστιν σύνεσις ἐν χαλινῷ καὶ κημῷ τὰς σιαγόνας αὐτῶν ἄγξαι τῶν μὴ ἐγγιζόντων πρὸς σέ

word.kjv: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the LORD, mercy shall compass him about.
word.thailand: อันความทุกข์ของคนชั่วนั้นมีมาก แต่ความเมตตาจะล้อมบุคคลที่วางใจในพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Muchos dolores para el impío; Mas el que espera en Jehová, lo cercará misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus dissipat consilia gentium ; reprobat autem cogitationes populorum, et reprobat consilia principum.
word.italian1927: Molti dolori aspettano l’empio; ma chi confida nell’Eterno, la sua grazia lo circonderà.
word.german1912: Der Gottlose hat viel Plage; wer aber auf den HERRN hofft, den wird die Güte umfangen.
word.french1910: Beaucoup de douleurs sont la part du méchant, Mais celui qui se confie en l'Eternel est environné de sa grâce.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人必受許多痛苦；但倚靠耶和華的，必有慈愛四面環繞他。
word.korean: 악인에게는 많은 슬픔이 있으나 여호와를 신뢰하는 자에게는 인자하심이 두르리로다
word.tagalog: Maraming kapanglawan ay sasapit sa masama: nguni't siyang tumitiwala sa Panginoon, kagandahang-loob ang liligid sa kaniya sa palibot.
word.maori: He tini nga mea whakapouri mo te tangata hara: ko te tangata ia e whakawhirinaki ana ki a Ihowa, ka karapotia e te atawhai.
word.cebuano: Daghan ang mga kasubo nga modangat sa mga tawong dautan; Apan siya nga magasalig kang Jehova, pagalikusan sa mahigugmaong-kalolot.
word.hebrew: י  רבים מכאובים לרשע    והבוטח ביהוה--חסד יסובבנו
word.hebrewmodern: רבים מכאובים לרשע והבוטח ביהוה חסד יסובבנו׃
word.greekot: κύριος διασκεδάζει βουλὰς ἐθνῶν ἀθετεῖ δὲ λογισμοὺς λαῶν καὶ ἀθετεῖ βουλὰς ἀρχόντων

word.kjv: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเนตรของพระเยโฮวาห์อยู่เหนือผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ เหนือผู้ที่หวังในความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: He aquí, el ojo de Jehová sobre los que le temen, Sobre los que esperan en su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Clamaverunt justi, et Dominus exaudivit eos ; et ex omnibus tribulationibus eorum liberavit eos.
word.italian1927: Ecco, l’occhio dell’Eterno è su quelli che lo temono, su quelli che sperano nella sua benignità,
word.german1912: Siehe, des HERRN Auge sieht auf die, so ihn fürchten, die auf seine Güte hoffen,
word.french1910: Voici, l'oeil de l'Eternel est sur ceux qui le craignent, Sur ceux qui espèrent en sa bonté,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眼睛看顧敬畏他的人，和那些仰望他慈愛的人；
word.korean: 여호와는 그 경외하는 자 곧 그 인자하심을 바라는 자를 살피사
word.tagalog: Narito, ang mata ng Panginoon ay nasa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya, sa kanila na nagsisiasa sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob;
word.maori: Nana, kei runga i te hunga e wehi ana i a ia te kanohi o Ihowa, kei te hunga e tumanako ana ki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang mata ni Jehova anaa sa ibabaw sa mga nagakahadlok kaniya, Sa ibabaw sa mga nagasalig sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot;
word.hebrew: יח  הנה עין יהוה אל-יראיו    למיחלים לחסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הנה עין יהוה אל יראיו למיחלים לחסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐκέκραξαν οἱ δίκαιοι καὶ ὁ κύριος εἰσήκουσεν αὐτῶν καὶ ἐκ πασῶν τῶν θλίψεων αὐτῶν ἐρρύσατο αὐτούς

word.kjv: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอความเมตตาของพระองค์จงอยู่เหนือข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายตามที่ข้าพระองค์หวังใจในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Sea tu misericordia, oh Jehová, sobre nosotros, Como esperamos en ti.
word.latinvulgate: Mors peccatorum pessima ; et qui oderunt justum delinquent.
word.italian1927: La tua benignità, o Eterno, sia sopra noi, poiché noi abbiamo sperato in te.
word.german1912: Deine Güte, HERR, sei über uns, wie wir auf dich hoffen.
word.french1910: Eternel! que ta grâce soit sur nous, Comme nous espérons en toi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你照著我們所仰望你的，向我們施慈愛。
word.korean: 여호와여, 우리가 주께 바라는 대로 주의 인자하심을 우리에게 베푸소서
word.tagalog: Sumaamin nawa ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ayon sa aming pagasa sa iyo.
word.maori: E Ihowa, hei runga i a matou tau mahi tohu; kia rite hoki ki ta matou tumanako ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ibutang sa ibabaw namo ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Oh Jehova, Sumala sa among paglaum kanimo.
word.hebrew: כב  יהי-חסדך יהוה עלינו    כאשר יחלנו לך
word.hebrewmodern: יהי חסדך יהוה עלינו כאשר יחלנו לך׃
word.greekot: θάνατος ἁμαρτωλῶν πονηρός καὶ οἱ μισοῦντες τὸν δίκαιον πλημμελήσουσιν

word.kjv: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ความเมตตาของพระองค์อยู่ในฟ้าสวรรค์ ความสัตย์ซื่อของพระองค์ไปถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Jehová, hasta los cielos es tu misericordia; Tu verdad hasta las nubes.
word.latinvulgate: Revela Domino viam tuam, et spera in eo, et ipse faciet.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, la tua benignità va fino al cielo, e la tua fedeltà fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: HERR, deine Güte reicht, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Eternel! ta bonté atteint jusqu'aux cieux, Ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你的慈愛上及諸天，你的信實高達雲霄。
word.korean: 주의 의는 하나님의 산들과 같고 주의 판단은 큰 바다와 일반이라 여호와여, 주는 사람과 짐승을 보호하시나이다
word.tagalog: Ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ay nasa mga langit: ang iyong pagtatapat ay umaabot hanggang sa langit.
word.maori: ¶ Kei nga rangi, e Ihowa, tau mahi tohu: tutuki noa atu tou pono ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot anaa sa mga langit; Ang imong pagkamatinumanon nagaabut ngadto sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: ה  און יחשב--על-משכבו    יתיצב על-דרך לא-טוב רע לא ימאס
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בהשמים חסדך אמונתך עד שחקים׃
word.greekot: ἀποκάλυψον πρὸς κύριον τὴν ὁδόν σου καὶ ἔλπισον ἐπ' αὐτόν καὶ αὐτὸς ποιήσει

word.kjv: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.
word.thailand: คนชั่วขอยืมและไม่จ่ายคืน แต่คนชอบธรรมนั้นแสดงความเมตตาและแจกจ่าย
word.spanish1909: El impío toma prestado, y no paga; Mas el justo tiene misericordia, y da.
word.latinvulgate: Qui retribuunt mala pro bonis detrahebant mihi, quoniam sequebar bonitatem.
word.italian1927: L’empio prende a prestito e non rende; ma il giusto è pietoso e dona.
word.german1912: Der Gottlose borgt und bezahlt nicht; der Gerechte aber ist barmherzig und gibt.
word.french1910: Le méchant emprunte, et il ne rend pas; Le juste est compatissant, et il donne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人借貸總不償還，義人卻慷慨施捨。
word.korean: 악인은 꾸고 갚지 아니하나 의인은 은혜를 베풀고 주는도다
word.tagalog: Ang masama ay humihiram, at hindi nagsasauli: nguni't ang matuwid ay nahahabag, at nagbibigay.
word.maori: ¶ E tango ana te tangata kino i te taonga tarewa, kahore hoki ana utu: ko te tangata tika ia he aroha tona, he homai.
word.cebuano: Ang dautan nagapangutang, ug dili na mobayad; Apan ang matarung adunay kalooy ug nagahatag.
word.hebrew: כא  לוה רשע ולא ישלם    וצדיק חונן ונותן
word.hebrewmodern: לוה רשע ולא ישלם וצדיק חונן ונותן׃
word.greekot: οἱ ἀνταποδιδόντες κακὰ ἀντὶ ἀγαθῶν ἐνδιέβαλλόν με ἐπεὶ κατεδίωκον δικαιοσύνην καὶ ἀπέρριψάν με τὸν ἀγαπητὸν ὡσεὶ νεκρὸν ἐβδελυγμένον

word.kjv: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงแสดงพระกรุณาต่อข้าพระองค์ตามความเมตตาของพระองค์ ขอทรงลบการละเมิดของข้าพระองค์ออกไปตามแต่พระกรุณาอันอุดมของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David, cuando después que entró á Bath-sebah, vino á él Nathán el profeta. TEN piedad de mí, oh Dios, conforme á tu misericordia: Conforme á la multitud de tus piedades borra mis rebeliones.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Intellectus David,
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Salmo di Davide, quando il profeta Natan venne a lui, dopo che Davide era stato da Batseba. Abbi pietà di me, o Dio, secondo la tua benignità; secondo la moltitudine delle tue compassioni, cancella i miei misfatti.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen;  da der Prophet Nathan zu ihm kam, als er war zu Bath-Seba eingegangen.  Gott, sei mir gnädig nach deiner Güte und tilge meine Sünden nach deiner großen Barmherzigkeit.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Psaume de David. Lorsque Nathan, le prophète, vint à lui, après que David fut allé vers Bath-Schéba. O Dieu! aie pitié de moi dans ta bonté; Selon ta grande miséricorde, efface mes transgressions;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長，是大衛和拔示巴同房以後，及先知拿單來見他以後作的。（本篇細字標題在《馬索拉抄本》為51:1~2）　神啊！求你按著你的慈愛恩待我，照著你豐盛的憐憫塗抹我的過犯。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래, 다윗이 밧세바와 동침한 후 선지자 나단이 저에게 온 때에) 하나님이여, 주의 인자를 좇아 나를 긍휼히 여기시며 주의 많은 자비를 좇아 내 죄과를 도말하소서
word.tagalog: Maawa ka sa akin, Oh Dios, ayon sa iyong kagandahang-loob: ayon sa karamihan ng iyong malumanay na mga kaawaan ay pinawi mo ang aking mga pagsalangsang.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri, i te taenga o Natana poropiti ki a ia, mo tona haerenga ki a Patehepa. Tohungia ahau, e te Atua, kia rite ki tou atawhai: kia rite ki tou aroha nui te murunga o oku he.
word.cebuano: Malooy ka kanako, Oh Dios, sumala sa imong mahigugmaongkalolot, Sumala sa kadaghanon sa imong mga malomong kalooy, palaa ang akong mga kalapasan.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח מזמור לדוד בבוא אליו נתן הנביא כאשר בא אל בת שבע חנני אלהים כחסדך כרב רחמיך מחה פשעי׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος συνέσεως τῷ δαυιδ

word.kjv: But I am like a green olive tree in the house of God: I trust in the mercy of God for ever and ever.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายข้าพเจ้าเป็นเหมือนต้นมะกอกเทศเขียวสดในพระนิเวศของพระเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าวางใจในความเมตตาของพระเจ้าเป็นนิจการ
word.spanish1909: Mas yo estoy como oliva verde en la casa de Dios: En la misericordia de Dios confío perpetua y eternalmente.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma io sono come un ulivo verdeggiante nella casa di Dio; io confido nella benignità di Dio in sempiterno.
word.german1912: Ich aber werde bleiben wie ein grüner Ölbaum im Hause Gottes, verlasse mich auf Gottes Güte immer und ewiglich.
word.french1910: Et moi, je suis dans la maison de Dieu comme un olivier verdoyant, Je me confie dans la bonté de Dieu, éternellement et à jamais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我就像　神殿中茂盛的橄欖樹一樣；我倚靠　神的慈愛，直到永永遠遠。
word.korean: 오직 나는 하나님의 집에 있는 푸른 감람나무 같음이여 하나님의 인자하심을 영영히 의지하리로다
word.tagalog: Nguni't tungkol sa akin, ay gaya ako ng sariwang punong kahoy ng olibo sa bahay ng Dios: tumitiwala ako sa kagandahang-loob ng Dios magpakailan-kailan man.
word.maori: Ko ahau ia, e rite ana ki te oriwa matomato i roto i te whare o te Atua: ka whakawhirinaki ahau ki te mahi tohu a te Atua ake ake.
word.cebuano: Apan mahatungod kanako, ako sama sa malunhaw nga oliva nga anaa sa balay sa Dios: Nagasalig ako sa mahigugmaong-kalolot sa Dios sa mga katuigan nga walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ח  ויראו צדיקים וייראו ועליו ישחקו
word.hebrewmodern: ואני כזית רענן בבית אלהים בטחתי בחסד אלהים עולם ועד׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He shall send from heaven, and save from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงใช้มาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ และช่วยข้าพเจ้าให้รอดจากการเยาะเย้ยของผู้ที่อยากกลืนข้าพเจ้าเสีย เซลาห์ พระเจ้าจะทรงใช้ความเมตตาและความจริงลงมา
word.spanish1909: El enviará desde los cielos, y me salvará De la infamia del que me apura; (Selah) Dios enviará su misericordia y su verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Etenim in corde iniquitates operamini ; in terra injustitias manus vestræ concinnant.
word.italian1927: Egli manderà dal cielo a salvarmi. Mentre colui che anela a divorarmi m’oltraggia, Sela. Iddio manderà la sua grazia e la sua fedeltà.
word.german1912: Er sendet vom Himmel und hilft mir von der Schmähung des, der wider mich schnaubt. (Sela.) Gott sendet seine Güte und Treue.
word.french1910: Il m'enverra du ciel le salut, Tandis que mon persécuteur se répand en outrages; -Pause. Dieu enverra sa bonté et sa fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神從天上施恩拯救我，斥責那踐踏我的人；（細拉）　神必向我發出他的慈愛和信實。
word.korean: 저가 하늘에서 보내사 나를 삼키려는 자의 비방에서 나를 구원하실지라 (셀라) 하나님이 그 인자와 진리를 보내시리로다
word.tagalog: Siya'y magsusugo mula sa langit, at ililigtas ako, pagka yaong lulunok sa akin ay dumuduwahagi; (Selah) susuguin ng Dios ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob at ang kaniyang katotohanan.
word.maori: Ka unga mai e ia he kaiwhakaora moku i te rangi, ina tawai te tangata e mea ana kia horomia ahau; (Hera.) ka unga mai e te Atua tana mahi tohu me tona pono.
word.cebuano: Siya magapadala gikan sa langit, ug magaluwas kanako, Sa diha nga ang buot motukob kanako magabiay-biay; (Selah Ang Dios magapadala sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot ug sa iyang kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: ג  אקרא לאלהים עליון    לאל גמר עלי
word.hebrewmodern: ישלח משמים ויושיעני חרף שאפי סלה ישלח אלהים חסדו ואמתו׃
word.greekot: καὶ γὰρ ἐν καρδίᾳ ἀνομίας ἐργάζεσθε ἐν τῇ γῇ ἀδικίαν αἱ χεῖρες ὑμῶν συμπλέκουσιν

word.kjv: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ใหญ่ยิ่งถึงฟ้าสวรรค์ ความจริงของพระองค์สูงถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Porque grande es hasta los cielos tu misericordia, Y hasta las nubes tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Priusquam intelligerent spinæ vestræ rhamnum, sicut viventes sic in ira absorbet eos.
word.italian1927: perché grande fino al cielo e la tua benignità, e la tua fedeltà fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: Denn deine Güte ist, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté atteint jusqu'aux cieux, Et ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你的慈愛偉大，高及諸天，你的信實上達雲霄。
word.korean: 대저 주의 인자는 커서 하늘에 미치고 주의 진리는 궁창에 이르나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay dakila hanggang sa mga langit, at ang iyong katotohanan hanggang sa mga alapaap.
word.maori: He nui hoki tau mahi tohu, a tutuki noa ki nga rangi, me tou pono a tutuki noa ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot daku ngadto sa mga langit, Ug ang imong kamatuoran hangtud sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: י  אודך בעמים אדני    אזמרך בלאמים
word.hebrewmodern: כי גדל עד שמים חסדך ועד שחקים אמתך׃
word.greekot: πρὸ τοῦ συνιέναι τὰς ἀκάνθας ὑμῶν τὴν ῥάμνον ὡσεὶ ζῶντας ὡσεὶ ἐν ὀργῇ καταπίεται ὑμᾶς

word.kjv: The God of my mercy shall prevent me: God shall let me see my desire upon mine enemies.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าแห่งความเมตตาของข้าพเจ้าจะทรงป้องกันข้าพเจ้า พระเจ้าจะทรงให้ข้าพเจ้าเห็นความปรารถนาของข้าพเจ้าต่อพวกศัตรูของข้าพเจ้านั้นสำเร็จ
word.spanish1909: El Dios de mi misericordia me prevendrá: Dios me hará ver en mis enemigos mi deseo.
word.latinvulgate: Moab olla spei meæ. In Idumæam extendam calceamentum meum : mihi alienigenæ subditi sunt.
word.italian1927: L’Iddio mio mi verrà incontro colla sua benignità, Iddio mi farà veder sui miei nemici quel che desidero.
word.german1912: Gott erzeigt mir reichlich seine Güte; Gott läßt mich meine Lust sehen an meinen Feinden.
word.french1910: Mon Dieu vient au-devant de moi dans sa bonté, Dieu me fait contempler avec joie ceux qui me persécutent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的　神必以慈愛迎接我；　神必叫我看見我的仇敵遭報。
word.korean: 나의 하나님이 그 인자하심으로 나를 영접하시며 내 원수의 보응받는 것을 나로 목도케 하시리이다
word.tagalog: Ang aking Dios pati ng kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay sasalubong sa akin: ipakikita ng Dios sa akin ang aking nasa sa aking mga kaaway.
word.maori: Kei mua i ahau toku Atua aroha: ma te Atua ahau ka kite i taku i hiahia ai ki oku hoariri.
word.cebuano: Ang akong Dios uban sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot mosugat kanako: Ang Dios magapakita kanako sa akong tinguha sa ibabaw sa akong mga kaaway.
word.hebrew: י  עזו אליך אשמרה    כי-אלהים משגבי
word.hebrewmodern: אלהי חסדו יקדמני אלהים יראני בשררי׃
word.greekot: μωαβ λέβης τῆς ἐλπίδος μου ἐπὶ τὴν ιδουμαίαν ἐκτενῶ τὸ ὑπόδημά μου ἐμοὶ ἀλλόφυλοι ὑπετάγησαν

word.kjv: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงถึงอานุภาพของพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงถึงความเมตตาของพระองค์ในเวลาเช้า เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นป้อมปราการของข้าพระองค์ เป็นที่ลี้ภัยในยามทุกข์ของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Yo empero cantaré tu fortaleza, Y loaré de mañana tu misericordia: Porque has sido mi amparo Y refugio en el día de mi angustia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma io canterò la tua potenza, e al mattino loderò ad alta voce la tua benignità, perché tu sei stato per me un alto ricetto, un rifugio nel giorno della mia distretta.
word.german1912: Ich aber will von deiner Macht singen und des Morgens rühmen deine Güte; denn du bist mir Schutz und Zuflucht in meiner Not.
word.french1910: Et moi, je chanterai ta force; Dès le matin, je célébrerai ta bonté. Car tu es pour moi une haute retraite, Un refuge au jour de ma détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我要歌頌你的能力，每天早晨我要向你的慈愛歡呼，因為你作了我的高臺，在患難的日子，作了我的避難所。
word.korean: 나는 주의 힘을 노래하며 아침에 주의 인자하심을 높이 부르오리니 주는 나의 산성이시며 나의 환난 날에 피난처심이니이다
word.tagalog: Nguni't aking aawitin ang iyong kalakasan; Oo, aking aawiting malakas ang iyong kagandahang-loob sa kinaumagahan: sapagka't ikaw ay naging aking matayog na moog, at kanlungan sa kaarawan ng aking kabagabagan.
word.maori: Ko ahau ia, ka waiatatia e ahau tou kaha; ae, i te ata ka hamamatia e ahau tau mahi toku: ko koe hoki toku pa, toku piringa i te ra o toku pouri.
word.cebuano: Apan magaawit ako mahatungod sa imong kusog; Oo, magaawit ako sa makusog gayud mahatungod sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot sa kabuntagon: Kay ikaw mao ang akong hataas nga torre, Ug usa ka dalangpanan sa adlaw sa akong kaguol.
word.hebrew: טז  המה ינועון (יניעון) לאכל--    אם-לא ישבעו וילינו
word.hebrewmodern: ואני אשיר עזך וארנן לבקר חסדך כי היית משגב לי ומנוס ביום צר לי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Unto thee, O my strength, will I sing: for God is my defence, and the God of my mercy.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระกำลังของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์ เพราะพระเจ้าทรงเป็นป้อมปราการของข้าพระองค์ และทรงเป็นพระเจ้าแห่งความเมตตาของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Fortaleza mía, á ti cantaré; Porque eres Dios de mi amparo, Dios de mi misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O mia forza, a te salmeggerò, perché Dio è il mio alto ricetto, l’Iddio benigno per me.
word.german1912: Ich will dir, mein Hort, lobsingen; denn du, Gott, bist mein Schutz und mein gnädiger Gott.
word.french1910: O ma force! c'est toi que je célébrerai, Car Dieu, mon Dieu tout bon, est ma haute retraite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的力量啊！我要向你歌唱；　神啊！你是我的高臺，是向我施慈愛的　神。
word.korean: 나의 힘이시여, 내가 주께 찬송하오리니 하나님은 나의 산성이시며 나를 긍휼히 여기시는 하나님이심이니이다
word.tagalog: Sa iyo, Oh kalakasan ko, aawit ako ng mga pagpuri: sapagka't ang Dios ay aking matayog na moog, ang Dios ng aking kaawaan.
word.maori: Ka himene ahau ki a koe, e toku kaha: ko te Atua nei hoki toku pa, toku Atua aroha.
word.cebuano: Alang kanimo, Oh akong kusog, magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg: Kay ang Dios maoy akong hataas nga torre, ang Dios sa akong kalooy.
word.hebrew: יז  ואני אשיר עזך--    וארנן לבקר חסדך כי-היית משגב לי    ומנוס ביום צר-לי [ (Psalms 59:18) יח  עזי אליך אזמרה    כי-אלהים משגבי אלהי חסדי ]
word.hebrewmodern: עזי אליך אזמרה כי אלהים משגבי אלהי חסדי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
word.thailand: ท่านจะคอยเฝ้าต่อพระพักตร์พระเจ้าเป็นนิตย์ ขอทรงแต่งตั้งความเมตตาและความจริงไว้คุ้มครองท่าน
word.spanish1909: Estará para siempre delante de Dios: Misericordia y verdad prepara que lo conserven.
word.latinvulgate: quia ipse Deus meus et salvator meus, adjutor meus, non emigrabo.
word.italian1927: Segga sul trono nel cospetto di Dio in perpetuo! Ordina alla benignità e alla verità di guardarlo;
word.german1912: daß er immer bleibe vor Gott. Erzeige ihm Güte und Treue, die ihn behüten.
word.french1910: Qu'il reste sur le trône éternellement devant Dieu! Fais que ta bonté et ta fidélité veillent sur lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他在　神面前永遠作王；願你指派慈愛和誠實保護他。
word.korean: 저가 영원히 하나님 앞에 거하리니 인자와 진리를 예비하사 저를 보호하소서
word.tagalog: Siya'y tatahan sa harap ng Dios magpakailan man: Oh maghanda ka ng kagandahang-loob at katotohanan, upang mapalagi siya.
word.maori: E noho ia i te aroaro o te Atua ake ake: whakaritea mai he aroha, he pono, hei tiaki i a ia.
word.cebuano: Siya magapuyo sa atubangan sa Dios sa walay katapusan: Oh pag-andam ug mahigugmaong-kalolot ug kamatuoran, aron sila magabantay kaniya.
word.hebrew: ז  ימים על-ימי-מלך תוסיף    שנותיו כמו-דר ודר
word.hebrewmodern: ישב עולם לפני אלהים חסד ואמת מן ינצרהו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι αὐτὸς θεός μου καὶ σωτήρ μου ἀντιλήμπτωρ μου οὐ μὴ μεταναστεύσω

word.kjv: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า และความเมตตาเป็นของพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงสนองมนุษย์ทุกคนตามการงานของเขา
word.spanish1909: Y de ti, oh Señor, es la misericordia: Porque tú pagas á cada uno conforme á su obra.
word.latinvulgate: Rex vero lætabitur in Deo ; laudabuntur omnes qui jurant in eo, quia obstructum est os loquentium iniqua.
word.italian1927: e a te pure, o Signore, appartiene la misericordia; perché tu renderai a ciascuno secondo le sue opere.
word.german1912: Und du, HERR, bist gnädig und bezahlst einem jeglichen, wie er's verdient.
word.french1910: A toi aussi, Seigneur! la bonté; Car tu rends à chacun selon ses oeuvres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主啊！慈愛也屬於你，你必照各人所作的報應各人。
word.korean: 주여, 인자함도 주께 속하였사오니 주께서 각 사람이 행한 대로 갚으심이니이다
word.tagalog: Sa iyo naman, Oh Panginoon, ukol ang kagandahang-loob: sapagka't ikaw ay nagbabayad sa bawa't tao ayon sa kaniyang gawa.
word.maori: Nau ano, e te Ariki, te mahi tohu: rite tonu hoki ki tana mahi tau utu ki te tangata.
word.cebuano: Kanimo usab, Oh Ginoo, imo man ang mahigugmaong-kalolot; Kay ikaw nagabalus sa tagsa-tagsa ka tawo sumala sa iyang buhat.
word.hebrew: יב  אחת דבר אלהים--שתים-זו שמעתי    כי עז לאלהים [ (Psalms 62:13) יג  ולך-אדני חסד    כי-אתה תשלם לאיש כמעשהו ]
word.hebrewmodern: ולך אדני חסד כי אתה תשלם לאיש כמעשהו׃
word.greekot: ὁ δὲ βασιλεὺς εὐφρανθήσεται ἐπὶ τῷ θεῷ ἐπαινεσθήσεται πᾶς ὁ ὀμνύων ἐν αὐτῷ ὅτι ἐνεφράγη στόμα λαλούντων ἄδικα

word.kjv: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
word.thailand: สาธุการแด่พระเจ้า เพราะว่าพระองค์ไม่ทรงปฏิเสธคำอธิษฐานของข้าพเจ้า หรือยับยั้งความเมตตาของพระองค์เสียจากข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Bendito Dios, Que no echó de sí mi oración, ni de mí su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Benedetto sia Iddio, che non ha rigettato la mia preghiera, né m’ha ritirato la sua benignità.
word.german1912: Gelobt sei Gott, der mein Gebet nicht verwirft noch seine Güte von mir wendet.
word.french1910: Béni soit Dieu, Qui n'a pas rejeté ma prière, Et qui ne m'a pas retiré sa bonté!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神是應當稱頌的，他沒有拒絕我的禱告，也沒有使他的慈愛離開我。
word.korean: 하나님을 찬송하리로다 ! 저가 내 기도를 물리치지 아니하시고 그 인자하심을 내게서 거두지도 아니하셨도다
word.tagalog: Purihin ang Dios, na hindi iniwaksi ang aking dalangin, ni ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob sa akin.
word.maori: Kia whakapaingia te Atua, kihai nei i whakapeau ke i taku inoi, i tana atawhai hoki ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Dalayegon ang Dios, Nga wala magsalikway sa akong pag-ampo, Ni sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot gikan kanako.
word.hebrew: כ  ברוך אלהים--    אשר לא-הסיר תפלתי וחסדו מאתי
word.hebrewmodern: ברוך אלהים אשר לא הסיר תפלתי וחסדו מאתי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But as for me, my prayer is unto thee, O LORD, in an acceptable time: O God, in the multitude of thy mercy hear me, in the truth of thy salvation.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ แต่ส่วนข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์อธิษฐานต่อพระองค์ในเวลาอันเหมาะสม ข้าแต่พระเจ้า โดยความเมตตาอันอุดมของพระองค์ ขอทรงโปรดฟังข้าพระองค์ด้วยความจริงแห่งความรอดของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Empero yo enderezaba mi oración á ti, oh Jehová, al tiempo de tu buena voluntad: Oh Dios, por la multitud de tu misericordia, Por la verdad de tu salud, óyeme.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma, quanto a me, la mia preghiera sale a te, o Eterno, nel tempo accettevole; o Dio, nella grandezza della tua misericordia, rispondimi, secondo la verità della tua salvezza.
word.german1912: Ich aber bete, HERR, zu dir zur angenehmen Zeit; Gott durch deine große Güte erhöre mich mit deiner treuen Hilfe.
word.french1910: Mais je t'adresse ma prière, ô Eternel! Que ce soit le temps favorable, ô Dieu, par ta grande bonté! Réponds-moi, en m'assurant ton secours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但是，耶和華啊！在悅納的時候，我向你禱告；　神啊！求你按著你豐盛的慈愛，憑著你信實的拯救應允我。
word.korean: 여호와여, 열납하시는 때에 나는 주께 기도하오니 하나님이여, 많은 인자와 구원의 진리로 내게 응답하소서
word.tagalog: Nguni't tungkol sa akin, ang dalangin ko'y sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, sa isang kalugodlugod na panahon: Oh Dios, sa karamihan ng iyong kagandahang-loob,
word.maori: ¶ Ko ahau ia, ki a koe taku inoi, e Ihowa, i te wa e manakohia ai: whakahokia mai he kupu ki ahau, e te Atua, i runga i te nui o tou aroha, o te pono o tau whakaoranga.
word.cebuano: apan mahitungod kanako, ang akong pag-ampo anha kanimo, Oh Jehova, sa panahon nga nahamut-an: Oh Dios, sa kadagaya sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Tubaga ako diha sa kamatuoran sa imong kaluwasan.
word.hebrew: יג  ישיחו בי ישבי שער    ונגינות שותי שכר
word.hebrewmodern: ואני תפלתי לך יהוה עת רצון אלהים ברב חסדך ענני באמת ישעך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore?
word.thailand: ความเมตตาของพระองค์จะระงับอยู่เป็นนิตย์หรือ พระสัญญาของพระองค์สิ้นสุดตลอดทุกชั่วอายุหรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿Hase acabado para siempre su misericordia? ¿Hase acabado la palabra suya para generación y generación?
word.latinvulgate: ne fiant, sicut patres eorum, generatio prava et exasperans ; generatio quæ non direxit cor suum, et non est creditus cum Deo spiritus ejus.
word.italian1927: E’ la sua benignità venuta meno per sempre? La sua parola ha ella cessato per ogni età?
word.german1912: Ist's denn ganz und gar aus mit seiner Güte, und hat die Verheißung ein Ende?
word.french1910: Sa bonté est-elle à jamais épuisée? Sa parole est-elle anéantie pour l'éternité?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的慈愛永遠消失，他的應許永久廢去嗎？
word.korean: 그 인자하심이 길이 다하였는가, 그 허락을 영구히 폐하셨는가
word.tagalog: Ang kaniya bang kagandahang-loob ay lubos na nawala magpakailan man? Natapos na bang walang hanggan ang kaniyang pangako?
word.maori: Kua kahore ranei tana mahi tohu mo ake tonu atu? Kua whati ranei tana kupu a ake ake?
word.cebuano: Natiti na ba ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot sa walay katapusan? Natapus na ba niya sa iyang saad sa walay katapusan?
word.hebrew: ח  הלעולמים יזנח אדני    ולא-יסיף לרצות עוד
word.hebrewmodern: האפס לנצח חסדו גמר אמר לדר ודר׃
word.greekot: ἵνα μὴ γένωνται ὡς οἱ πατέρες αὐτῶν γενεὰ σκολιὰ καὶ παραπικραίνουσα γενεά ἥτις οὐ κατηύθυνεν τὴν καρδίαν αὐτῆς καὶ οὐκ ἐπιστώθη μετὰ τοῦ θεοῦ τὸ πνεῦμα αὐτῆς

word.kjv: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงสำแดงความเมตตาของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลาย และขอประทานความรอดของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์ทั้งปวง
word.spanish1909: Muéstranos, oh Jehová, tu misericordia, Y danos tu salud.
word.latinvulgate: In die tribulationis meæ clamavi ad te, quia exaudisti me.
word.italian1927: Mostraci la tua benignità, o Eterno, e dacci la tua salvezza.
word.german1912: HERR, erzeige uns deine Gnade und hilf uns!
word.french1910: Eternel! fais-nous voir ta bonté, Et accorde-nous ton salut!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你使我們得見你的慈愛，又把你的救恩賜給我們。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 인자하심을 우리에게 보이시며 주의 구원을 우리에게 주소서
word.tagalog: Ipakita mo sa amin ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, at ipagkaloob mo sa amin ang iyong pagliligtas.
word.maori: E Ihowa, whakakitea mai tau mahi tohu ki a matou: tukua mai ki a matou tau whakaoranga.
word.cebuano: Ipakita kanamo, Oh Jehova, ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug ihatag kanamo ang imong kaluwasan.
word.hebrew: ז  הלא-אתה תשוב תחינו    ועמך ישמחו-בך
word.hebrewmodern: הראנו יהוה חסדך וישעך תתן לנו׃
word.greekot: ἐν ἡμέρᾳ θλίψεώς μου ἐκέκραξα πρὸς σέ ὅτι εἰσήκουσάς μου

word.kjv: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า เพราะพระองค์ประเสริฐและทรงพร้อมที่จะประทานอภัย อุดมด้วยความเมตตาต่อบรรดาผู้ร้องทูลพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque tú, Señor, eres bueno y perdonador, Y grande en misericordia para con todos los que te invocan.
word.latinvulgate: Numquid Sion dicet : Homo et homo natus est in ea, et ipse fundavit eam Altissimus ?
word.italian1927: Poiché tu, o Signore, sei buono, pronto a perdonare, e di gran benignità verso tutti quelli che t’invocano.
word.german1912: Denn du, HERR, bist gut und gnädig, von großer Güte allen, die dich anrufen.
word.french1910: Car tu es bon, Seigneur, tu pardonnes, Tu es plein d'amour pour tous ceux qui t'invoquent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主啊！你是良善，又樂意饒恕人的，向你呼求的，你都以豐盛的慈愛待他們。
word.korean: 주는 선하사 사유하기를 즐기시며 주께 부르짖는 자에게 인자함이 후하심이니이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw, Panginoon, ay mabuti, at mapagpatawad, at sagana sa kagandahang-loob sa lahat na tumatawag sa iyo.
word.maori: He pai hoki koe, e te Ariki, he ngawari: e ranea ana hoki tau mahi tohu ki te hunga katoa e karanga ana ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw, Oh Ginoo, maayo man, ug andam sa pagpasaylo, Ug madagayaon sa mahigugmaong-kalolot alang niadtong tanan nga nanagsapit kanimo.
word.hebrew: ה  כי-אתה אדני טוב וסלח    ורב-חסד לכל-קראיך
word.hebrewmodern: כי אתה אדני טוב וסלח ורב חסד לכל קראיך׃
word.greekot: μήτηρ σιων ἐρεῖ ἄνθρωπος καὶ ἄνθρωπος ἐγενήθη ἐν αὐτῇ καὶ αὐτὸς ἐθεμελίωσεν αὐτὴν ὁ ὕψιστος

word.kjv: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
word.thailand: เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ที่ทรงมีต่อข้าพระองค์นั้นใหญ่ยิ่งนัก และพระองค์ทรงช่วยจิตวิญญาณของข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากที่ลึกที่สุดของนรก
word.spanish1909: Porque tu misericordia es grande para conmigo; Y has librado mi alma del hoyo profundo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Perché grande è la tua benignità verso me, e tu hai riscossa l’anima mia dal fondo del soggiorno de’ morti.
word.german1912: Denn deine Güte ist groß über mich; du hast meine Seele errettet aus der tiefen Hölle.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté est grande envers moi, Et tu délivres mon âme du séjour profond des morts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你向我大施慈愛，你救了我的命，免入陰間的深處。
word.korean: 이는 내게 향하신 주의 인자가 크사 내 영혼을 깊은 음부에서 건지셨음이니이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't dakila ang iyong kagandahang-loob sa akin; at iyong iniligtas ang aking kaluluwa sa pinakamalalim na Sheol.
word.maori: He nui hoki tau mahi tohu ki ahau: a kua whakaorangia e koe toku wairua i te reinga i raro riro.
word.cebuano: Kay daku ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot nganhi kanako; Ug giluwas mo ang akong kalag gikan sa Sheol nga labing halalum.
word.hebrew: יג  כי-חסדך גדול עלי    והצלת נפשי משאול תחתיה
word.hebrewmodern: כי חסדך גדול עלי והצלת נפשי משאול תחתיה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า แต่พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้ากอปรด้วยพระกรุณาและพระเมตตา ทรงกริ้วช้า และอุดมด้วยความเมตตา และความจริง
word.spanish1909: Mas tú, Señor, Dios misericordioso y clemente, Lento para la ira, y grande en misericordia y verdad;
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma tu, o Signore, sei un Dio pietoso e misericordioso, lento all’ira e grande in benignità e in verità.
word.german1912: Du aber, HERR, Gott, bist barmherzig und gnädig, geduldig und von großer Güte und Treue.
word.french1910: Mais toi, Seigneur, tu es un Dieu miséricordieux et compatissant, Lent à la colère, riche en bonté et en fidélité;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但是，主啊！你是有憐憫有恩典的　神，你不輕易發怒，並且有極大的慈愛和信實。
word.korean: 그러나 주여, 주는 긍휼히 여기시며 은혜를 베푸시며 노하기를 더디 하시며 인자와 진실이 풍성하신 하나님이시오니
word.tagalog: Nguni't ikaw, Oh Panginoon, ay Dios na puspos ng kahabagan at mapagbiyaya, banayad sa pagkagalit, at sagana sa kagandahang-loob at katotohanan.
word.maori: Ko koe ia, e te Ariki, he Atua atawhai, he tohu tangata: he puhoi ki te riri, e hua ana te mahi tohu me te pono.
word.cebuano: Apan ikaw, Oh Ginoo, mao ang Dios nga maloloy-on ug puno sa gracia, Mahinay sa kasuko ug madagayaon sa mahigugmaong-kalolot ug sa kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: טו  ואתה אדני אל-רחום וחנון    ארך אפים ורב-חסד ואמת
word.hebrewmodern: ואתה אדני אל רחום וחנון ארך אפים ורב חסד ואמת׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
word.thailand: ขอทรงหันมาเมตตาข้าพระองค์ ขอประทานกำลังแก่ผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ และขอทรงช่วยชีวิตบุตรชายของหญิงคนใช้ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mírame, y ten misericordia de mí: Da tu fortaleza á tu siervo, Y guarda al hijo de tu sierva.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Volgiti a me, ed abbi pietà di me; da’ la tua forza al tuo servitore, e salva il figliuolo della tua servente.
word.german1912: Wende dich zu mir, sei mir gnädig; stärke deinen Knecht mit deiner Kraft und hilf dem Sohn deiner Magd!
word.french1910: Tourne vers moi les regards et aie pitié de moi, Donne la force à ton serviteur, Et sauve le fils de ta servante!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你轉向我，恩待我；把你的能力賜給你的僕人，拯救你婢女的兒子。
word.korean: 내게로 돌이키사 나를 긍휼히 여기소서 주의 종에게 힘을 주시고 주의 여종의 아들을 구원하소서
word.tagalog: Oh bumalik ka sa akin, at maawa ka sa akin; ibigay mo ang lakas mo sa iyong lingkod. At iligtas mo ang anak ng iyong lingkod na babae.
word.maori: Tahuri mai ki ahau, tohungia hoki ahau: homai tou kaha ki tau pononga, whakaorangia te tama a tau pononga wahine.
word.cebuano: Oh lingia ako, ug malooy ka kanako. Ihatag ang imong kalig-on sa imong ulipon, Ug luwasa ang anak nga lalake sa imong ulipon nga babaye.
word.hebrew: טז  פנה אלי וחנני    תנה-עזך לעבדך והושיעה לבן-אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: פנה אלי וחנני תנה עזך לעבדך והושיעה לבן אמתך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne: mercy and truth shall go before thy face.
word.thailand: ความเที่ยงธรรมและความยุติธรรมเป็นรากฐานแห่งบัลลังก์ของพระองค์ ความเมตตาและความจริงเดินนำหน้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Justicia y juicio son el asiento de tu trono: Misericordia y verdad van delante de tu rostro.
word.latinvulgate: Repleti sumus mane misericordia tua ; et exsultavimus, et delectati sumus omnibus diebus nostris.
word.italian1927: Giustizia e diritto son la base del tuo trono, benignità e verità van davanti alla tua faccia.
word.german1912: Gerechtigkeit und Gericht ist deines Stuhles Festung; Gnade und Wahrheit sind vor deinem Angesicht.
word.french1910: La justice et l'équité sont la base de ton trône. La bonté et la fidélité sont devant ta face.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 公義和公正是你寶座的基礎，慈愛和信實行在你前面。
word.korean: 의와 공의가 주의 보좌의 기초라 인자함과 진실함이 주를 앞서 행하나이다
word.tagalog: Katuwiran at kahatulan ay patibayan ng iyong luklukan: kagandahang-loob at katotohanan ay nagpapauna sa iyong mukha.
word.maori: Ko te tika me te whakawa te turanga o tou torona: e haere ana te mahi tohu me te pono i mua i tou aroaro.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkamatarung ug ang justicia mao ang patukoranan sa imong trono: Ang mahigugmaong-kalolot ug ang kamatuoran magauna sa imong nawong.
word.hebrew: יד  לך זרוע עם-גבורה    תעז ידך תרום ימינך
word.hebrewmodern: צדק ומשפט מכון כסאך חסד ואמת יקדמו פניך׃
word.greekot: ἐνεπλήσθημεν τὸ πρωὶ τοῦ ἐλέους σου καὶ ἠγαλλιασάμεθα καὶ εὐφράνθημεν ἐν πάσαις ταῖς ἡμέραις ἡμῶν

word.kjv: But my faithfulness and my mercy shall be with him: and in my name shall his horn be exalted.
word.thailand: ความสัตย์สุจริตและความเมตตาของเราจะอยู่กับเขา และเขาของเขาจะเป็นที่เชิดชูโดยนามของเรา
word.spanish1909: Y mi verdad y mi misericordia serán con él; Y en mi nombre será ensalzado su cuerno.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La mia fedeltà e la mia benignità saranno con lui, e nel mio nome la sua potenza sarà esaltata.
word.german1912: aber meine Wahrheit und Gnade soll bei ihm sein, und sein Horn soll in meinem Namen erhoben werden.
word.french1910: Ma fidélité et ma bonté seront avec lui, Et sa force s'élèvera par mon nom.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的信實和慈愛必與他同在，他的角必因我的名被高舉。
word.korean: 나의 성실함과 인자함이 저와 함께 하리니 내 이름을 인하여 그 뿔이 높아지리로다
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang pagtatapat ko at ang kagandahang-loob ko ay sasa kaniya; at sa pangalan ko'y matataas ang kaniyang sungay.
word.maori: Otira ka mau ki a ia toku pono me taku mahi tohu: a ma toku ingoa ka ara ai tona haona.
word.cebuano: Apan ang akong pagkamatinumanon ug ang akong mahigugmaong-kalolot magauban kaniya; Ug tungod sa akong ngalan pagabayawon ang iyang sungay.
word.hebrew: כד  וכתותי מפניו צריו    ומשנאיו אגוף
word.hebrewmodern: ואמונתי וחסדי עמו ובשמי תרום קרנו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: My mercy will I keep for him for evermore, and my covenant shall stand fast with him.
word.thailand: เราจะเก็บความเมตตาของเราไว้ให้เขาเป็นนิตย์ และพันธสัญญาของเราจะตั้งมั่นคงอยู่เพื่อเขา
word.spanish1909: Para siempre le conservaré mi misericordia; Y mi alianza será firme con él.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io gli conserverò la mia benignità in perpetuo, e il mio patto rimarrà fermo con lui.
word.german1912: Ich will ihm ewiglich bewahren meine Gnade, und mein Bund soll ihm fest bleiben.
word.french1910: Je lui conserverai toujours ma bonté, Et mon alliance lui sera fidèle;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要永遠保持我對他的慈愛，我和他所立的約必堅立。
word.korean: 저를 위하여 나의 인자함을 영구히 지키고 저로 더불어 한 나의 언약을 굳게 세우며
word.tagalog: Ang kagandahang-loob ko'y aking iingatan sa kaniya magpakailan man, at ang tipan ko'y mananayong matibay sa kaniya.
word.maori: Ka rongoatia e ahau taku mahi tohu mona ake tonu atu: ka mau tonu taku kawenata ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Nga magatipig ako alang kaniya sa akong mahigugmaong-kalolot sa walay katapusan; Ug ang akong tugon magapadayon uban kaniya.
word.hebrew: כח  אף-אני בכור אתנהו    עליון למלכי-ארץ
word.hebrewmodern: לעולם אשמור לו חסדי ובריתי נאמנת לו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.
word.thailand: ขอทรงให้ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายอิ่มในเวลาเช้าด้วยความเมตตาของพระองค์ เพื่อข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะได้เปรมปรีดิ์และยินดีตลอดวันเวลาของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Sácianos presto de tu misericordia: Y cantaremos y nos alegraremos todos nuestros días.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam in me speravit, liberabo eum ; protegam eum, quoniam cognovit nomen meum.
word.italian1927: Saziaci al mattino della tua benignità, e noi giubileremo, ci rallegreremo tutti i dì nostri.
word.german1912: Fülle uns früh mit deiner Gnade, so wollen wir rühmen und fröhlich sein unser Leben lang.
word.french1910: Rassasie-nous chaque matin de ta bonté, Et nous serons toute notre vie dans la joie et l'allégresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你使我們早晨飽嘗你的慈愛，好使我們一生一世歡呼喜樂。
word.korean: 아침에 주의 인자로 우리를 만족케 하사 우리 평생에 즐겁고 기쁘게 하소서
word.tagalog: Oh busugin mo kami sa kinaumagahan ng iyong kagandahang-loob; upang kami ay mangagalak at mangatuwa sa lahat ng kaarawan namin.
word.maori: Kia na matou i te ata i tau mahi tohu: kia hari ai matou, kia koa ai, i o matou ra katoa.
word.cebuano: Oh busga kami sa kabuntagon sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Aron kami managmaya ug managkalipay sa tanan namong mga adlaw.
word.hebrew: יד  שבענו בבקר חסדך    ונרננה ונשמחה בכל-ימינו
word.hebrewmodern: שבענו בבקר חסדך ונרננה ונשמחה בכל ימינו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐπ' ἐμὲ ἤλπισεν καὶ ῥύσομαι αὐτόν σκεπάσω αὐτόν ὅτι ἔγνω τὸ ὄνομά μου

word.kjv: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O LORD, held me up.
word.thailand: เมื่อข้าพเจ้าได้คิดว่า "เท้าของข้าพลาด" ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ความเมตตาของพระองค์ยึดข้าพระองค์ไว้
word.spanish1909: Cuando yo decía: Mi pie resbala: Tu misericordia, oh Jehová, me sustentaba.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Quand’ho detto: Il mio piè vacilla, la tua benignità, o Eterno, m’ha sostenuto.
word.german1912: Ich sprach: Mein Fuß hat gestrauchelt; aber deine Gnade, HERR, hielt mich.
word.french1910: Quand je dis: Mon pied chancelle! Ta bonté, ô Eternel! me sert d'appui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我說：“我失了腳”，耶和華啊！那時你的慈愛就扶持我。
word.korean: 여호와여, 나의 발이 미끄러진다 말할 때에 주의 인자하심이 나를 붙드셨사오며
word.tagalog: Nang aking sabihin, Ang aking paa ay natitisod; inalalayan ako ng iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon.
word.maori: I taku meatanga, Ka paheke toku waewae; na tau mahi tohu, e Ihowa, ahau i tautoko ake.
word.cebuano: Sa pag-ingon ko: Ang akong tiil nahadalin-as; Ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Oh Jehova, nagsapnay kanako.
word.hebrew: יח  אם-אמרתי מטה רגלי    חסדך יהוה יסעדני
word.hebrewmodern: אם אמרתי מטה רגלי חסדך יהוה יסעדני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงระลึกถึงความเมตตาและความจริงของพระองค์ต่อวงศ์วานอิสราเอล ที่สุดปลายแผ่นดินโลกทั้งสิ้นได้เห็นความรอดของพระเจ้าของเรา
word.spanish1909: Hase acordado de su misericordia y de su verdad para con la casa de Israel: Todos los términos de la tierra han visto la salud de nuestro Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Confiteantur nomini tuo magno, quoniam terribile et sanctum est,
word.italian1927: Si è ricordato della sua bontà e della sua fedeltà verso la casa d’Israele; tutte le estremità della terra han veduto la salvezza del nostro Dio.
word.german1912: Er gedenkt an seine Gnade und Wahrheit dem Hause Israel; aller Welt Enden sehen das Heil unsers Gottes.
word.french1910: Il s'est souvenu de sa bonté et de sa fidélité envers la maison d'Israël, Toutes les extrémités de la terre ont vu le salut de notre Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他記念他向以色列家所應許的慈愛和信實，地的四極都看見我們　神的救恩。
word.korean: 저가 이스라엘 집에 향하신 인자와 성실을 기억하셨으므로 땅의 모든 끝이 우리 하나님의 구원을 보았도다
word.tagalog: Kaniyang inalaala ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob at ang kaniyang pagtatapat sa bahay ng Israel: nakita ng lahat ng mga wakas ng lupa ang pagliligtas ng aming Dios.
word.maori: Kua mahara ia ki tana mahi tohu, ki tona pono ki te whare o Iharaira; a kua kite nga pito katoa o te whenua i te whakaoranga a to tatou Atua.
word.cebuano: Siya nahinumdum sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot ug sa iyang pagkamatinumanon alang sa balay sa Israel: Ang tanang mga kinatumyan sa yuta nakakita sa kaluwasan sa atong Dios.
word.hebrew: ג  זכר חסדו ואמונתו--    לבית ישראל ראו כל-אפסי-ארץ--    את ישועת אלהינו
word.hebrewmodern: זכר חסדו ואמונתו לבית ישראל ראו כל אפסי ארץ את ישועת אלהינו׃
word.greekot: ἐξομολογησάσθωσαν τῷ ὀνόματί σου τῷ μεγάλῳ ὅτι φοβερὸν καὶ ἅγιόν ἐστιν

word.kjv: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ประเสริฐ ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์ และความจริงของพระองค์ดำรงอยู่ทุกชั่วอายุ
word.spanish1909: Porque Jehová es bueno: para siempre es su misericordia, Y su verdad por todas las generaciones.
word.latinvulgate: Detrahentem secreto proximo suo, hunc persequebar, superbo oculo, et insatiabili corde, cum hoc non edebam.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno è buono; la sua benignità dura in perpetuo, e la sua fedeltà per ogni età.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR ist freundlich, und seine Gnade währet ewig und seine Wahrheit für und für.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel est bon; sa bonté dure toujours, Et sa fidélité de génération en génération.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華本是美善的，他的慈愛存到永遠，他的信實直到萬代。
word.korean: 대저 여호와는 선하시니 그 인자하심이 영원하고 그 성실하심이 대대에 미치리로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay mabuti; ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man; at ang kaniyang pagtatapat ay sa lahat ng sali't saling lahi.
word.maori: He pai hoki a Ihowa, pumau tonu tana mahi tohu: a kei tena whakatupuranga, kei tena whakatupuranga, tona pono.
word.cebuano: Kay si Jehova maayo man; ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan, Ug ang iyang pagka-matinumanon ngadto sa tanang mga kaliwatan.
word.hebrew: ה  כי-טוב יהוה לעולם חסדו    ועד-דר ודר אמונתו
word.hebrewmodern: כי טוב יהוה לעולם חסדו ועד דר ודר אמונתו׃
word.greekot: τὸν καταλαλοῦντα λάθρᾳ τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ τοῦτον ἐξεδίωκον ὑπερηφάνῳ ὀφθαλμῷ καὶ ἀπλήστῳ καρδίᾳ τούτῳ οὐ συνήσθιον

word.kjv: I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O LORD, will I sing.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงเรื่องความเมตตาและความยุติธรรม ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงถวายพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. MISERICORDIA y juicio cantaré: A ti cantaré yo, oh Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Oratio pauperis, cum anxius fuerit, et in conspectu Domini effuderit precem suam.
word.italian1927: Salmo di Davide. Io canterò la benignità e la giustizia; a te, o Eterno, salmeggerò.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. Von Gnade und Recht will ich singen und dir, HERR, lobsagen.
word.french1910: De David. Psaume. Je chanterai la bonté et la justice; C'est à toi, Eternel! que je chanterai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。我要歌唱慈愛和公正；耶和華啊！我要向你歌頌。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 내가 인자와 공의를 찬송하겠나이다 여호와여, 내가 주께 찬양하리이다
word.tagalog: Aking aawitin ang kagandahang-loob at kahatulan: sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, aawit ako ng mga pagpupuri.
word.maori: ¶ He himene na Rawiri. Ka waiatatia e ahau te mahi tohu me te whakawa tika: ka himene atu ahau ki a koe, e Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Magaawit ako tungod sa mahigugmaong-kalolot ug justicia: Kanimo, Oh Jehova, magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: א  לדוד מזמור    חסד-ומשפט אשירה לך יהוה אזמרה
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד מזמור חסד ומשפט אשירה לך יהוה אזמרה׃
word.greekot: προσευχὴ τῷ πτωχῷ ὅταν ἀκηδιάσῃ καὶ ἐναντίον κυρίου ἐκχέῃ τὴν δέησιν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงลุกขึ้นเมตตาศิโยน เพราะถึงเวลาที่จะทรงพระกรุณาเธอ เออ เวลากำหนดมาถึงแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Tú levantándote, tendrás misericordia de Sión; Porque el tiempo de tener misericordia de ella, porque el plazo es llegado.
word.latinvulgate: Quomodo miseretur pater filiorum, misertus est Dominus timentibus se.
word.italian1927: Tu ti leverai ed avrai compassione di Sion, poiché è tempo d’averne pietà; il tempo fissato è giunto.
word.german1912: Du wollest dich aufmachen und über Zion erbarmen; denn es ist Zeit, daß du ihr gnädig seist, und die Stunde ist gekommen.
word.french1910: Tu te lèveras, tu auras pitié de Sion; Car le temps d'avoir pitié d'elle, Le temps fixé est à son terme;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要起來，憐憫錫安，因為現在是恩待錫安的時候；所定的日期已經到了。
word.korean: 주께서 일어나사 시온을 긍휼히 여기시리니 지금은 그를 긍휼히 여기실 때라 정한 기한이 옴이니이다
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay babangon at maaawa sa Sion: sapagka't kapanahunan ng pagkaawa sa kaniya, Oo, ang takdang panahon ay dumating.
word.maori: Tera koe e whakatika, e aroha ki a Hiona; kua taka mai hoki te wa, ae ra, te tino wa, hei atawhainga i a ia.
word.cebuano: Ikaw motindog, ug abuton ug kalooy sa Sion; Kay panahon na sa pagkalooy kaniya, Oo, ang panahon nga gitagal miabut na.
word.hebrew: יג  ואתה יהוה לעולם תשב    וזכרך לדר ודר
word.hebrewmodern: אתה תקום תרחם ציון כי עת לחננה כי בא מועד׃
word.greekot: καθὼς οἰκτίρει πατὴρ υἱούς οἰκτίρησεν κύριος τοὺς φοβουμένους αὐτόν

word.kjv: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงพระกรุณาและมีพระคุณ ทรงกริ้วช้าและอุดมด้วยความเมตตา
word.spanish1909: Misericordioso y clemente es Jehová; Lento para la ira, y grande en misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Ascendunt montes, et descendunt campi in locum quem fundasti eis.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è pietoso e clemente, lento all’ira e di gran benignità.
word.german1912: Barmherzig und gnädig ist der HERR, geduldig und von großer Güte.
word.french1910: L'Eternel est miséricordieux et compatissant, Lent à la colère et riche en bonté;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華有憐憫，有恩典，不輕易發怒，並且有豐盛的慈愛。
word.korean: 여호와는 자비로우시며 은혜로우시며 노하기를 더디 하시며 인자하심이 풍부하시도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay puspos ng kahabagan at mapagbiyaya, banayad sa pagkagalit at sagana sa kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: Ki tonu a Ihowa i te aroha me te atawhai, he puhoi ki te riri, he nui hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova maloloy-on man ug puno sa gracia, Mahinay sa pagkasuko, ug madagayaon sa mahigugmaong-kalolot.
word.hebrew: ח  רחום וחנון יהוה    ארך אפים ורב-חסד
word.hebrewmodern: רחום וחנון יהוה ארך אפים ורב חסד׃
word.greekot: ἀναβαίνουσιν ὄρη καὶ καταβαίνουσιν πεδία εἰς τόπον ὃν ἐθεμελίωσας αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าฟ้าสวรรค์สูงเหนือแผ่นดินเท่าใด ความเมตตาของพระองค์ที่มีต่อบรรดาคนที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ก็ใหญ่ยิ่งเท่านั้น
word.spanish1909: Porque como la altura de los cielos sobre la tierra, Engrandeció su misericordia sobre los que le temen.
word.latinvulgate: Potabunt omnes bestiæ agri ; expectabunt onagri in siti sua.
word.italian1927: Poiché quanto i cieli sono alti al disopra della terra, tanto è grande la sua benignità verso quelli che lo temono.
word.german1912: Denn so hoch der Himmel über der Erde ist, läßt er seine Gnade walten über die, so ihn fürchten.
word.french1910: Mais autant les cieux sont élevés au-dessus de la terre, Autant sa bonté est grande pour ceux qui le craignent;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天離地有多高，他的慈愛向敬畏他的人也有多大。
word.korean: 이는 하늘이 땅에서 높음 같이 그를 경외하는 자에게 그 인자하심이 크심이로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kung paanong ang mga langit ay mataas kay sa lupa, gayon kalaki ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya.
word.maori: He rite hoki ki te rangi e tiketike ake ana i te whenua, pera tonu te nui o tana mahi tohu ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Kay ingon nga ang mga langit hataas ibabaw sa yuta, Ingon man kadaku ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot ngadto kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya.
word.hebrew: יא  כי כגבה שמים על-הארץ--    גבר חסדו על-יראיו
word.hebrewmodern: כי כגבה שמים על הארץ גבר חסדו על יראיו׃
word.greekot: ποτιοῦσιν πάντα τὰ θηρία τοῦ ἀγροῦ προσδέξονται ὄναγροι εἰς δίψαν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children;
word.thailand: แต่ความเมตตาของพระเยโฮวาห์นั้นดำรงอยู่ตั้งแต่นิรันดร์กาลถึงนิรันดร์กาลต่อผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ และความชอบธรรมของพระองค์ต่อหลานเหลน
word.spanish1909: Mas la misericordia de Jehová desde el siglo y hasta el siglo sobre los que le temen, Y su justicia sobre los hijos de los hijos;
word.latinvulgate: illic passeres nidificabunt, herodii domus dux est eorum ;
word.italian1927: Ma la benignità dell’Eterno dura ab eterno e in eterno, sopra quelli che lo temono, e la sua giustizia sopra i figliuoli de’ figliuoli
word.german1912: Die Gnade aber des HERRN währet von Ewigkeit zu Ewigkeit über die, so ihn fürchten, und seine Gerechtigkeit auf Kindeskind
word.french1910: Mais la bonté de l'Eternel dure à jamais pour ceux qui le craignent, Et sa miséricorde pour les enfants de leurs enfants,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但從亙古到永遠，耶和華的慈愛臨到敬畏他的人；他的公義也歸於他們的子子孫孫，
word.korean: 여호와의 인자하심은 자기를 경외하는 자에게 영원부터 영원까지 이르며 그의 의는 자손의 자손에게 미치리니
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang kagandahang-loob ng Panginoon ay mula ng walang pasimula hanggang sa walang hanggan sa nangatatakot sa kaniya, at ang kaniyang katuwiran ay hanggang sa mga anak ng mga anak;
word.maori: Tena ko te mahi tohu a Ihowa no tua whakarere, a ake tonu ake, ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia: tona tika hoki ki nga uri o nga tamariki;
word.cebuano: Apan ang mahigugmaong-kalolot ni Jehova nagagikan sa walay katapusan ngadto sa walay katapusan ibabaw kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya, Ug ang iyang pagkamatarung ngadto sa mga anak sa mga anak;
word.hebrew: יז  וחסד יהוה מעולם ועד-עולם--    על-יראיו וצדקתו    לבני בנים
word.hebrewmodern: וחסד יהוה מעולם ועד עולם על יראיו וצדקתו לבני בנים׃
word.greekot: ἐκεῖ στρουθία ἐννοσσεύσουσιν τοῦ ἐρωδιοῦ ἡ οἰκία ἡγεῖται αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ประเสริฐ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: ALELUYA. Alabad á Jehová, porque es bueno; Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Confitemini Domino, quoniam bonus, quoniam in sæculum misericordia ejus.
word.italian1927: Alleluia! Celebrate l’Eterno, perch’egli è buono, perché la sua benignità dura in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Danket dem HERRN; denn er ist freundlich, und seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Louez l'Eternel, car il est bon, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌　神恩待悖逆的子民（代上16:34~36）你們要讚美耶和華。你們要稱謝耶和華，因為他是美善的；他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 여호와께 감사하라 그는 선하시며 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon; sapagka't siya'y mabuti; sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakawhetai ki a Ihowa; he pai hoki ia: he pumau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Oh magpasalamat kamo kang Jehova; kay maayo man siya; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaongkalolot nagalungtad sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הודו ליהוה כי-טוב--    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הללויה הודו ליהוה כי טוב כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ἐξομολογεῖσθε τῷ κυρίῳ ὅτι χρηστός ὅτι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τὸ ἔλεος αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ประเสริฐ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: ALABAD á Jehová, porque es bueno; Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Canticum Psalmi, ipsi David.
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Eterno, perch’egli è buono, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno!
word.german1912: Danket dem HERRN; denn er ist freundlich, und seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel, car il est bon, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌　神拯救他的子民你們要稱謝耶和華，因他本是良善的；他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 여호와께 감사하라 ! 그는 선하시며 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon; sapagka't siya'y mabuti: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: ¶ Whakawhetai ki a Ihowa, he pai hoki ia: he pumau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh managpasalamat kamo kang Jehova; kay siya maayo man; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagalungtad sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: א  הדו ליהוה כי-טוב    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הדו ליהוה כי טוב כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ᾠδὴ ψαλμοῦ τῷ δαυιδ

word.kjv: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ใหญ่ยิ่งเหนือฟ้าสวรรค์ ความจริงของพระองค์สูงถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Porque grande más que los cielos es tu misericordia, Y hasta los cielos tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Pro eo ut me diligerent, detrahebant mihi ; ego autem orabam.
word.italian1927: Perché grande al disopra de’ cieli è la tua benignità e la tua fedeltà giunge fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: Denn deine Gnade reicht, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté s'élève au-dessus des cieux, Et ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你的慈愛偉大，高及諸天；你的信實上達雲霄。
word.korean: 대저 주의 인자하심이 하늘 위에 광대하시며 주의 진실은 궁창에 미치나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay dakila sa itaas sa mga langit, at ang iyong katotohanan ay umaabot sa mga alapaap.
word.maori: He nui atu hoki tau mahi tohu i nga rangi, a ko tou pono tutuki noa atu ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot daku man ibabaw sa kalangitan; Ug ang imong kamatuoran naga-abut ngadto sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: ד  אודך בעמים יהוה    ואזמרך בלאמים
word.hebrewmodern: כי גדול מעל שמים חסדך ועד שחקים אמתך׃
word.greekot: ἀντὶ τοῦ ἀγαπᾶν με ἐνδιέβαλλόν με ἐγὼ δὲ προσευχόμην

word.kjv: Let there be none to extend mercy unto him: neither let there be any to favour his fatherless children.
word.thailand: ขออย่าให้ผู้ใดเอ็นดูเขา อย่าให้ผู้ใดสงสารลูกกำพร้าพ่อของเขา
word.spanish1909: No tenga quien le haga misericordia; Ni haya quien tenga compasión de sus huérfanos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Nessuno estenda a lui la sua benignità, e non vi sia chi abbia pietà de’ suoi orfani.
word.german1912: Und niemand müsse ihm Gutes tun, und niemand erbarme sich seiner Waisen.
word.french1910: Que nul ne conserve pour lui de l'affection, Et que personne n'ait pitié de ses orphelins!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願無人對他施仁慈；願無人恩待他的孤兒。
word.korean: 저에게 은혜를 계속할 자가 없게 하시며 그 고아를 연휼할 자도 없게 하시며
word.tagalog: Mawalan nawa ng maawa sa kaniya; at mawalan din ng maawa sa kaniyang mga anak na ulila.
word.maori: Kaua tetahi hei hoatu noa i te aroha ki a ia: kaua hoki tetahi hei atawhai i ana pani.
word.cebuano: Ayaw itugot nga may malooy pa kaniya; Ni may bisan kinsa nga malooy pa sa iyang mga anak nga ilo.
word.hebrew: יב  אל-יהי-לו משך חסד    ואל-יהי חונן ליתומיו
word.hebrewmodern: אל יהי לו משך חסד ואל יהי חונן ליתומיו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy, but persecuted the poor and needy man, that he might even slay the broken in heart.
word.thailand: เพราะเขาไม่จดจำที่จะแสดงความเอ็นดู แต่ข่มเหงคนจนและคนขัดสน เพื่อจะฆ่าคนที่เศร้าใจเสีย
word.spanish1909: Por cuanto no se acordo de hacer misericordia, Y persiguió al hombre afligido y menesteroso Y quebrantado de corazón, para matar lo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: perch’egli non si è ricordato d’usar benignità, ma ha perseguitato il misero, il povero, il tribolato di cuore per ucciderlo.
word.german1912: darum daß er so gar keine Barmherzigkeit hatte, sondern verfolgte den Elenden und Armen und Betrübten, daß er ihn tötete. {~}
word.french1910: Parce qu'il ne s'est pas souvenu d'exercer la miséricorde, Parce qu'il a persécuté le malheureux et l'indigent, Jusqu'à faire mourir l'homme au coeur brisé!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他從沒有想起要施慈愛，只知道迫害困苦、貧窮和傷心的人，要把他們置於死地。
word.korean: 저가 긍휼히 여길 일을 생각지 아니하고 가난하고 궁핍한 자와 마음이 상한 자를 핍박하여 죽이려 한 연고니이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't hindi niya naalaalang magpakita ng kaawaan, kundi hinabol ang dukha at mapagkailangan, at ang may bagbag na puso, upang patayin.
word.maori: Mona kihai i mahara ki te mahi tohu: heoi tukino ana ia i te ware, i te rawakore, i te hunga ngakau maru, kia patua ai ratou.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay wala siya mahinumdum sa pagpakita ug kalooy, Kondili gilutos niya ang tawong kabus ug hangul, Ug ang nadugmokan sa kasing-kasing, aron sa pagpatay kanila .
word.hebrew: טז  יען--    אשר לא זכר עשות חסד וירדף איש-עני ואביון--ונכאה לבב    למותת
word.hebrewmodern: יען אשר לא זכר עשות חסד וירדף איש עני ואביון ונכאה לבב למותת׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But do thou for me, O GOD the Lord, for thy name's sake: because thy mercy is good, deliver thou me.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้าคือองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า ขอทรงกระทำเพื่อข้าพระองค์โดยเห็นแก่พระนามของพระองค์ เพราะว่าความเมตตาของพระองค์นั้นประเสริฐ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ให้พ้น
word.spanish1909: Y tú, Jehová Señor, haz conmigo por amor de tu nombre: Líbrame, porque tu misericordia es buena.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma tu, o Eterno, o Signore, opera in mio favore, per amor del tuo nome; poiché la tua misericordia è buona, liberami,
word.german1912: Aber du, HERR HERR, sei du mit mir um deines Namens willen; denn deine Gnade ist mein Trost: errette mich!
word.french1910: Et toi, Eternel, Seigneur! agis en ma faveur à cause de ton nom, Car ta bonté est grande; délivre-moi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於你，主耶和華啊！求你為你名的緣故恩待我；按著你美好的慈愛拯救我。
word.korean: 주 여호와여, 주의 이름을 인하여 나를 선대하시며 주의 인자하심이 선함을 인하여 나를 건지소서
word.tagalog: Nguni't gumawa kang kasama ko, Oh Dios na Panginoon, alang-alang sa iyong pangalan: sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay mabuti, iligtas mo ako,
word.maori: ¶ Kia puta tau mahi moku, e te Atua, e te Ariki, he whakaaro ki tou ingoa: na te mea he pai tau mahi tohu, whakaorangia ahau,
word.cebuano: Apan himoon mo kanako, Oh Jehova nga Ginoo, sumala sa imong ngalan: Tungod kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot maayo man, luwason mo ako;
word.hebrew: כא  ואתה יהוה אדני--    עשה-אתי למען שמך כי-טוב חסדך    הצילני
word.hebrewmodern: ואתה יהוה אדני עשה אתי למען שמך כי טוב חסדך הצילני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Help me, O LORD my God: O save me according to thy mercy:
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ให้รอดตามความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Ayúdame, Jehová Dios mío: Sálvame conforme á tu misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Aiutami, o Eterno, mio Dio, salvami secondo la tua benignità,
word.german1912: Stehe mir bei, HERR, mein Gott! hilf mir nach deiner Gnade,
word.french1910: Secours-moi, Eternel, mon Dieu! Sauve-moi par ta bonté!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華我的　神啊！求你幫助我；求你按著你的慈愛拯救我，
word.korean: 여호와 나의 하나님이여, 나를 도우시며 주의 인자하심을 좇아 나를 구원하소서
word.tagalog: Tulungan mo ako, Oh Panginoon kong Dios; Oh iligtas mo ako ayon sa iyong kagandahang-loob:
word.maori: Awhinatia ahau, e Ihowa, e toku Atua: kia rite ki tou aroha tau whakaora i ahau.
word.cebuano: Tabangi ako, Oh Jehova, Dios ko; Oh luwasa ako sumala sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot:
word.hebrew: כו  עזרני יהוה אלהי    הושיעני כחסדך
word.hebrewmodern: עזרני יהוה אלהי הושיעני כחסדך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ มิใช่แก่เหล่าข้าพระองค์ มิใช่แก่เหล่าข้าพระองค์ พระเจ้าข้า แต่ขอถวายสง่าราศีแด่พระนามของพระองค์ เพราะเห็นแก่ความเมตตาของพระองค์ และความจริงของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: NO á nosotros, oh Jehová, no á nosotros, Sino á tu nombre da gloria; Por tu misericordia, por tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Credidi, propter quod locutus sum ; ego autem humiliatus sum nimis.
word.italian1927: Non a noi, o Eterno, non a noi, ma al tuo nome da’ gloria, per la tua benignità e per la tua fedeltà!
word.german1912: Nicht uns, HERR, nicht uns, sondern deinem Namen gib Ehre um deine Gnade und Wahrheit!
word.french1910: Non pas à nous, Eternel, non pas à nous, Mais à ton nom donne gloire, A cause de ta bonté, à cause de ta fidélité!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神是我們唯一的倚靠耶和華啊！不要把榮耀歸給我們，不要歸給我們；要因你的慈愛和信實把榮耀歸在你的名下。
word.korean: 여호와여, 영광을 우리에게 돌리지 마옵소서 우리에게 돌리지 마옵소서 오직 주의 인자하심과 진실하심을 인하여 주의 이름에 돌리옵소서
word.tagalog: Huwag sa amin, Oh Panginoon, huwag sa amin, kundi sa iyong pangalan ay magbigay kang karangalan, dahil sa iyong kagandahang-loob, at dahil sa iyong katotohanan.
word.maori: ¶ Aua ki a matou, e Ihowa, aua ki a matou, engari me hoatu te kororia ki tou ingoa: whakaaroa tou aroha, tou pono.
word.cebuano: Dili kanamo, Oh Jehova, dili kanamo, Kondili sa imong ngalan ihatag ang himaya, Tungod sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, ug tungod sa imong kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: א  לא לנו יהוה לא-לנו    כי-לשמך תן כבוד--על-חסדך על-אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: לא לנו יהוה לא לנו כי לשמך תן כבוד על חסדך על אמתך׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ἐπίστευσα διὸ ἐλάλησα ἐγὼ δὲ ἐταπεινώθην σφόδρα

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ประเสริฐ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: ALABAD á Jehová, porque es bueno; Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. ALEPH. Beati immaculati in via, qui ambulant in lege Domini.
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Eterno, poiché egli è buono, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Danket dem HERRN; denn er ist freundlich, und seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel, car il est bon, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱謝　神的幫助和拯救你們要稱謝耶和華，因他本是良善的；他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 여호와께 감사하라 ! 저는 선하시며 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon; sapagka't siya'y mabuti: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: ¶ Whakawhetai ki a Ihowa; he pai hoki ia, he pumau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh paghatag kamo ug mga pasalamat kang Jehova; kay siya maayo man; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: א  הודו ליהוה כי-טוב    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו ליהוה כי טוב כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια αλφ μακάριοι οἱ ἄμωμοι ἐν ὁδῷ οἱ πορευόμενοι ἐν νόμῳ κυρίου

word.kjv: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: บัดนี้จงให้อิสราเอลกล่าวว่า "ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์"
word.spanish1909: Diga ahora Israel: Que para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Beati qui scrutantur testimonia ejus, in toto corde exquirunt eum.
word.italian1927: Sì, dica Israele: La sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Es sage nun Israel: Seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Qu'Israël dise: Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願以色列說：“他的慈愛永遠長存。”
word.korean: 이제 이스라엘은 말하기를 그 인자하심이 영원하다 할지로다
word.tagalog: Magsabi ngayon ang Israel, na ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Kia mea a Iharaira, He pumau tonu tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Ipaingon sa Israel karon, Nga ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ב  יאמר-נא ישראל    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: יאמר נא ישראל כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: μακάριοι οἱ ἐξερευνῶντες τὰ μαρτύρια αὐτοῦ ἐν ὅλῃ καρδίᾳ ἐκζητήσουσιν αὐτόν

word.kjv: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: บัดนี้จงให้วงศ์วานอาโรนกล่าวว่า "ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์"
word.spanish1909: Diga ahora la casa de Aarón: Que para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Non enim qui operantur iniquitatem in viis ejus ambulaverunt.
word.italian1927: Sì, dica la casa d’Aaronne: La sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Es sage nun das Haus Aaron: Seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Que la maison d'Aaron dise: Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願亞倫家說：“他的慈愛永遠長存。”
word.korean: 이제 아론의 집은 말하기를 그 인자하심이 영원하다 할지로다
word.tagalog: Magsabi ngayon ang sangbahayan ni Aaron, na ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Kia mea te whare o Arona, He pumau tonu tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Karon ipaingon sa panimalay ni Aaron, Nga ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ג  יאמרו-נא בית-אהרן    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: יאמרו נא בית אהרן כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: οὐ γὰρ οἱ ἐργαζόμενοι τὴν ἀνομίαν ἐν ταῖς ὁδοῖς αὐτοῦ ἐπορεύθησαν

word.kjv: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: บัดนี้จงให้บรรดาผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์กล่าวว่า "ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์"
word.spanish1909: Digan ahora los que temen á Jehová: Que para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Tu mandasti mandata tua custodiri nimis.
word.italian1927: Sì, dicano quelli che temono l’Eterno: La sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Es sagen nun, die den HERRN fürchten: Seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Que ceux qui craignent l'Eternel disent: Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願敬畏耶和華的說：“他的慈愛永遠長存。”
word.korean: 이제 여호와를 경외하는 자는 말하기를 그 인자하심이 영원하다 할지로다
word.tagalog: Mangagsabi ngayon ang nangatatakot sa Panginoon, na ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Kia mea te hunga e wehi ana i a Ihowa, He pumau tonu tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Ipaingon karon kanila nga nangahadlok kang Jehova, Nga ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay kapusan.
word.hebrew: ד  יאמרו-נא יראי יהוה    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: יאמרו נא יראי יהוה כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: σὺ ἐνετείλω τὰς ἐντολάς σου φυλάξασθαι σφόδρα

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ประเสริฐ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Alabad á Jehová porque es bueno; Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Viam iniquitatis amove a me, et de lege tua miserere mei.
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Eterno, perch’egli è buono, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Danket dem HERRN; denn er ist freundlich, und sein Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel, car il est bon, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要稱謝耶和華，因他本是良善的；他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon, sapagka't siya'y mabuti: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Whakawhetai ki a Ihowa; he pai hoki ia: he pumau tonu tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh managpasalamat kamo kang Jehova; kay siya maayo man; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כט  הודו ליהוה כי-טוב    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו ליהוה כי טוב כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ὁδὸν ἀδικίας ἀπόστησον ἀπ' ἐμοῦ καὶ τῷ νόμῳ σου ἐλέησόν με

word.kjv: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ แผ่นดินโลกเต็มด้วยความเมตตาของพระองค์ ขอทรงสอนกฎเกณฑ์ของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: De tu misericordia, oh Jehová, está llena la tierra: Enséñame tus estatutos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O Eterno, la terra è piena della tua benignità; insegnami i tuoi statuti.
word.german1912: HERR, die Erde ist voll deiner Güte; lehre mich deine Rechte.
word.french1910: La terre, ô Eternel! est pleine de ta bonté; Enseigne-moi tes statuts!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你的慈愛遍滿大地；求你把你的律例教導我。
word.korean: 내가 새벽 전에 부르짖으며 주의 말씀을 바랐사오며
word.tagalog: Ang lupa, Oh Panginoon, ay puno ng iyong kagandahang-loob: ituro mo sa akin ang iyong mga palatuntunan.
word.maori: ¶ Ki tonu, e Ihowa, te whenua i tau mahi tohu: whakaakona ahau ki au tikanga. TETE
word.cebuano: Ang yuta, Oh Jehova, napuno sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot: Tudloi ako sa imong kabalaoran.
word.hebrew: סד  חסדך יהוה מלאה הארץ    חקיך למדני
word.hebrewmodern: חסדך יהוה מלאה הארץ חקיך למדני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.
word.thailand: ขอทรงกระทำแก่ผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ตามความเมตตาของพระองค์ และขอทรงสอนกฎเกณฑ์ของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Haz con tu siervo según tu misericordia, Y enséñame tus estatutos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Opera verso il tuo servitore secondo la tua benignità, e insegnami i tuoi statuti.
word.german1912: Handle mit deinem Knecht nach deiner Gnade und lehre mich deine Rechte.
word.french1910: Agis envers ton serviteur selon ta bonté, Et enseigne-moi tes statuts!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你按著你的慈愛待你的僕人，把你的律例教導我。
word.korean: 나의 사랑하는 바 주의 계명을 스스로 즐거워하며
word.tagalog: Gawan mo ang lingkod mo ng ayon sa iyong kagandahang-loob, at ituro mo sa akin ang mga palatuntunan mo.
word.maori: ¶ Kia rite ki tou aroha tau mahi ki tau pononga: whakaakona hoki ahau ki au tikanga.
word.cebuano: Buhata sa imong alagad sumala sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug tudloi ako sa imong kabalaoran.
word.hebrew: קכד  עשה עם-עבדך כחסדך    וחקיך למדני
word.hebrewmodern: עשה עם עבדך כחסדך וחקיך למדני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด ตาของผู้รับใช้มองดูมือนายของตนฉันใด และตาของสาวใช้มองดูมือนายหญิงของตนฉันใด ตาของข้าพเจ้าทั้งหลายมองดูพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของข้าพเจ้าทั้งหลายจนกว่าพระองค์จะมีพระกรุณาต่อข้าพเจ้าทั้งหลายฉันนั้น
word.spanish1909: He aquí como los ojos de los siervos miran á la mano de sus señores, Y como los ojos de la sierva á la mano de su señora; Así nuestros ojos miran á Jehová nuestro Dios, Hasta que haya misericordia de nosotros.
word.latinvulgate: nisi quia Dominus erat in nobis : cum exsurgerent homines in nos,
