word.italian1927: Ecco, come gli occhi dei servi guardano la mano del loro padrone, come gli occhi della serva guardano la mano della sua padrona,
word.german1912: Siehe! wie die Augen der Knechte auf die Hände ihrer Herren sehen, wie die Augen der Magd auf die Hände ihrer Frau, also sehen unsre Augen auf den HERRN, unsern Gott, bis er uns gnädig werde.
word.french1910: Voici, comme les yeux des serviteurs sont fixés sur la main de leurs maîtres, Et les yeux de la servante sur la main de sa maîtresse, Ainsi nos yeux se tournent vers l'Eternel, notre Dieu, Jusqu'à ce qu'il ait pitié de nous.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 僕人的眼睛怎樣望著主人的手，婢女的眼睛怎樣望著主母的手，我們的眼睛也照樣望著耶和華我們的　神，直到他向我們施恩。
word.korean: 종의 눈이 그 상전의 손을 여종의 눈이 그 주모의 손을 바람같이 우리 눈이 여호와 우리 하나님을 바라며 우리를 긍휼히 여기시기를 기다리나이다
word.tagalog: Narito, kung paanong tumitingin ang mga mata ng mga alipin sa kamay ng kanilang panginoon, kung paano ang mga mata ng alilang babae sa kamay ng kaniyang panginoong babae; gayon tumitingin ang mga mata namin sa Panginoon naming Dios, hanggang sa siya'y maawa sa amin.
word.maori: Ina, pera tonu nga kanohi o nga pononga e titiro nei ki te ringa o to ratou rangatira, nga kanohi hoki o te kotiro ki te ringa o tona rangatira wahine; me o matou kanohi e titiro nei ki a Ihowa, ki to matou Atua, kia tohu ra ano ia i a matou.
word.cebuano: Tan-awa, ingon nga ang mga mata sa mga alagad nanagtutok sa kamot sa ilang mga agalon, Ingon sa mga mata sa alagad nga babaye ngadto sa iyang agalon nga babaye; Mao usab ang among mga mata nagatutok kang Jehova nga among Dios, Hangtud nga siya adunay kalooy kanamo.
word.hebrew: ב  הנה כעיני עבדים    אל-יד אדוניהם-- כעיני שפחה    אל-יד גברתה כן עינינו אל-יהוה אלהינו--    עד שיחננו
word.hebrewmodern: הנה כעיני עבדים אל יד אדוניהם כעיני שפחה אל יד גברתה כן עינינו אל יהוה אלהינו עד שיחננו׃
word.greekot: εἰ μὴ ὅτι κύριος ἦν ἐν ἡμῖν ἐν τῷ ἐπαναστῆναι ἀνθρώπους ἐφ' ἡμᾶς

word.kjv: Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงพระกรุณาต่อพวกข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงพระกรุณาต่อพวกข้าพระองค์เถิด พระเจ้าข้า เพราะพวกข้าพระองค์เอือมระอาความหมิ่นประมาท
word.spanish1909: Ten misericordia de nosotros, oh Jehová, ten misericordia de nosotros; Porque estamos muy hartos de menosprecio.
word.latinvulgate: forte vivos deglutissent nos ; cum irasceretur furor eorum in nos,
word.italian1927: così gli occhi nostri guardano all’Eterno, all’Iddio nostro, finché egli abbia pietà di noi.
word.german1912: Sei uns gnädig, HERR, sei uns gnädig! denn wir sind sehr voll Verachtung.
word.french1910: Aie pitié de nous, Eternel, aie pitié de nous! Car nous sommes assez rassasiés de mépris;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你向我們施恩，求你向我們施恩；因為我們飽受藐視，到了極點。
word.korean: 여호와여, 우리를 긍휼히 여기시고 긍휼히 여기소서 심한 멸시가 우리에게 넘치나이다
word.tagalog: Maawa ka sa amin, Oh Panginoon, maawa ka sa amin: sapagka't kami ay lubhang lipos ng kadustaan.
word.maori: Tohungia matou, e Ihowa, tohungia matou: kua tino kapi hoki matou i te whakahawea.
word.cebuano: Malooy ka kanamo, Oh Jehova, malooy ka kanamo; Kay sa hilabihan gayud napun-an kami sa pagtamay.
word.hebrew: ג  חננו יהוה חננו    כי-רב שבענו בוז
word.hebrewmodern: חננו יהוה חננו כי רב שבענו בוז׃
word.greekot: ἄρα ζῶντας ἂν κατέπιον ἡμᾶς ἐν τῷ ὀργισθῆναι τὸν θυμὸν αὐτῶν ἐφ' ἡμᾶς

word.kjv: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
word.thailand: จงให้อิสราเอลหวังใจในพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะในพระเยโฮวาห์มีความเมตตา และในพระองค์มีการไถ่อย่างสมบูรณ์
word.spanish1909: Espere Israel á Jehová; Porque en Jehová hay misericordia. Y abundante redención con él.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O Israele, spera nell’Eterno, poiché presso l’Eterno è benignità e presso di lui è abbondanza di redenzione.
word.german1912: Israel, hoffe auf den HERRN! denn bei dem HERRN ist die Gnade und viel Erlösung bei ihm,
word.french1910: Israël, mets ton espoir en l'Eternel! Car la miséricorde est auprès de l'Eternel, Et la rédemption est auprès de lui en abondance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列啊！你要仰望耶和華，因為耶和華有慈愛，也有豐盛的救恩。
word.korean: 이스라엘아 여호와를 바랄지어다 ! 여호와께는 인자하심과 풍성한 구속이 있음이라
word.tagalog: Oh Israel, umasa ka sa Panginoon; sapagka't sa Panginoon ay may kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: E Iharaira, kia tumanako ki a Ihowa, kei a Ihowa hoki te mahi tohu, a kei a ia te hokonga nui.
word.cebuano: Oh Israel, lumaum ka kang Jehova; Kay kang Jehova anaa ang mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug kaniya anaa ang madagayaong pagtubos.
word.hebrew: ז  יחל ישראל אל-יהוה    כי-עם-יהוה החסד והרבה עמו פדות
word.hebrewmodern: יחל ישראל אל יהוה כי עם יהוה החסד והרבה עמו פדות׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงประเสริฐ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: ALABAD á Jehová, porque es bueno; Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus David, Jeremiæ. Super flumina Babylonis illic sedimus et flevimus, cum recordaremur Sion.
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Eterno, perché egli è buono, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Danket dem HERRN; denn er ist freundlich, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel, car il est bon, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱謝　神創造和拯救之恩你們要稱謝耶和華，因他本是良善的，他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 여호와께 감사하라 ! 그는 선하시며 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon; sapagka't siya'y mabuti: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: ¶ Whakawhetai ki a Ihowa, he pai hoki ia: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh paghatag ug mga pasalamat kang Jehova; kay siya maayo man; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: א  הודו ליהוה כי-טוב    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו ליהוה כי טוב כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: τῷ δαυιδ ἐπὶ τῶν ποταμῶν βαβυλῶνος ἐκεῖ ἐκαθίσαμεν καὶ ἐκλαύσαμεν ἐν τῷ μνησθῆναι ἡμᾶς τῆς σιων

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเจ้าผู้เหนือพระทั้งหลาย เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Alabad al Dios de los dioses, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: In salicibus in medio ejus suspendimus organa nostra ;
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Iddio degli dèi, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Danket dem Gott aller Götter, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez le Dieu des dieux, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要稱謝萬神之神，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 모든 신에 뛰어나신 하나님께 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Dios ng mga dios: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Whakawhetai ki te Atua o nga atua: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh paghatag ug mga pasalamat ngadto sa Dios sa mga dios; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ב  הודו לאלהי האלהים    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו לאלהי האלהים כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ ταῖς ἰτέαις ἐν μέσῳ αὐτῆς ἐκρεμάσαμεν τὰ ὄργανα ἡμῶν

word.kjv: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้เป็นเจ้าเหนือเจ้าทั้งหลาย เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Alabad al Señor de los señores, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: quia illic interrogaverunt nos, qui captivos duxerunt nos, verba cantionum ; et qui abduxerunt nos : Hymnum cantate nobis de canticis Sion.
word.italian1927: Celebrate li Signor dei signori, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Danket dem HERRN aller Herren, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich,
word.french1910: Louez le Seigneur des seigneurs, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要稱謝萬主之主，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 모든 주에 뛰어나신 주께 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Panginoon ng mga panginoon: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Whakawhetai ki te Ariki o nga ariki: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh paghatag ug mga pasalamat ngadto sa Ginoo sa mga ginoo; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ג  הודו לאדני האדנים    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו לאדני האדנים כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐκεῖ ἐπηρώτησαν ἡμᾶς οἱ αἰχμαλωτεύσαντες ἡμᾶς λόγους ᾠδῶν καὶ οἱ ἀπαγαγόντες ἡμᾶς ὕμνον ᾄσατε ἡμῖν ἐκ τῶν ᾠδῶν σιων

word.kjv: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงกระทำการมหัศจรรย์ยิ่งใหญ่แต่องค์เดียว เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al solo que hace grandes maravillas, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Quomodo cantabimus canticum Domini in terra aliena ?
word.italian1927: Colui che solo opera grandi maraviglie, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: der große Wunder tut allein, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: Celui qui seul fait de grands prodiges, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那獨行大奇事的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 홀로 큰 기사를 행하시는 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na gumagawang magisa ng mga dakilang kababalaghan: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: E mahi nei tona kotahi i nga merekara nunui: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Kaniya lamang nga nagabuhat sa dagkung mga katingalahan; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ד  לעשה נפלאות גדלות לבדו    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: לעשה נפלאות גדלות לבדו כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: πῶς ᾄσωμεν τὴν ᾠδὴν κυρίου ἐπὶ γῆς ἀλλοτρίας

word.kjv: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงสร้างฟ้าสวรรค์ด้วยพระสติปัญญา เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al que hizo los cielos con entendimiento, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Si oblitus fuero tui, Jerusalem, oblivioni detur dextera mea.
word.italian1927: Colui che ha fatto con intendimento i cieli, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: der die Himmel weislich gemacht hat, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: Celui qui a fait les cieux avec intelligence, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那用智慧造成諸天的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 지혜로 하늘을 지으신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이 로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na gumawa ng mga langit sa pamamagitan ng unawa: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: I tohunga rawa nei ki te hanga i nga rangi: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Kaniya nga tungod sa salabutan gihimo ang kalangitan; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ה  לעשה השמים בתבונה    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: לעשה השמים בתבונה כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἐπιλάθωμαί σου ιερουσαλημ ἐπιλησθείη ἡ δεξιά μου

word.kjv: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงกางแผ่นดินโลกออกเหนือน้ำทั้งหลาย เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al que tendió la tierra sobre las aguas, Porque para siempre es su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Adhæreat lingua mea faucibus meis, si non meminero tui ; si non proposuero Jerusalem in principio lætitiæ meæ.
word.italian1927: Colui che ha steso la terra sopra le acque, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: der die Erde auf Wasser ausgebreitet hat, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: Celui qui a étendu la terre sur les eaux, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那鋪張大地在水上的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 땅을 물 위에 펴신이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na naglalatag ng lupa sa ibabaw ng tubig: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: I whakatakoto nei i te whenua ki runga ki nga wai: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Kaniya nga nagbuklad sa yuta ibabaw sa mga tubig; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ו  לרקע הארץ על-המים    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: לרקע הארץ על המים כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: κολληθείη ἡ γλῶσσά μου τῷ λάρυγγί μου ἐὰν μή σου μνησθῶ ἐὰν μὴ προανατάξωμαι τὴν ιερουσαλημ ἐν ἀρχῇ τῆς εὐφροσύνης μου

word.kjv: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงสร้างดวงสว่างใหญ่ๆ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al que hizo las grandes luminarias, Porque para siempre es su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Memor esto, Domine, filiorum Edom, in die Jerusalem, qui dicunt : Exinanite, exinanite usque ad fundamentum in ea.
word.italian1927: Colui che ha fatto i grandi luminari, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno:
word.german1912: der große Lichter gemacht hat, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich:
word.french1910: Celui qui a fait les grands luminaires, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那造成大光的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 큰 빛들을 지으신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na gumawa ng mga dakilang tanglaw; sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man:
word.maori: Ki te kaihanga i nga whakamarama nunui: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Kaniya nga nagbuhat sa mga dagkung suga; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan;
word.hebrew: ז  לעשה אורים גדלים    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: לעשה אורים גדלים כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: μνήσθητι κύριε τῶν υἱῶν εδωμ τὴν ἡμέραν ιερουσαλημ τῶν λεγόντων ἐκκενοῦτε ἐκκενοῦτε ἕως ὁ θεμέλιος ἐν αὐτῇ

word.kjv: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
word.thailand: สร้างดวงอาทิตย์ให้ครองกลางวัน เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El sol para que dominase en el día, Porque para siempre es su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Filia Babylonis misera ! beatus qui retribuet tibi retributionem tuam quam retribuisti nobis.
word.italian1927: il sole per regnare sul giorno, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno;
word.german1912: Die Sonne, dem Tag vorzustehen, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich,
word.french1910: Le soleil pour présider au jour, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他造太陽管白晝，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 해로 낮을 주관케 하신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Ng araw upang magpuno sa araw: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man:
word.maori: I te ra hei tohutohu i te awatea: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Ang adlaw aron sa paggahum sa adlaw; Kay ang iyang mahugugmaong-kalolot
word.hebrew: ח  את-השמש לממשלת ביום    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: את השמש לממשלת ביום כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: θυγάτηρ βαβυλῶνος ἡ ταλαίπωρος μακάριος ὃς ἀνταποδώσει σοι τὸ ἀνταπόδομά σου ὃ ἀνταπέδωκας ἡμῖν

word.kjv: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ดวงจันทร์และดาวทั้งหลายให้ครองกลางคืน เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: La luna y las estrellas para que dominasen en la noche, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Beatus qui tenebit, et allidet parvulos tuos ad petram.
word.italian1927: e la luna e le stelle per regnare sulla notte, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: den Mond und Sterne, der Nacht vorzustehen, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: La lune et les étoiles pour présider à la nuit, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他造月亮和星星管黑夜，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 달과 별들로 밤을 주관케 하신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Ng buwan at mga bituin upang magpuno sa gabi: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: I te marama me nga whetu hei tohutohu i te po: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Ang bulan ug mga bitoon aron sa paggahum sa kagabhion; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ט  את-הירח וכוכבים לממשלות בלילה    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: את הירח וכוכבים לממשלות בלילה כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ὃς κρατήσει καὶ ἐδαφιεῖ τὰ νήπιά σου πρὸς τὴν πέτραν

word.kjv: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงตีอียิปต์ทางบรรดาลูกหัวปี เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al que hirió á Egipto en sus primogénitos, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Colui che percosse gli Egizi nei loro primogeniti, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno;
word.german1912: der Ägypten schlug an ihren Erstgeburten, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich
word.french1910: Celui qui frappa les Egyptiens dans leurs premiers-nés, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那擊殺埃及所有頭生的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 애굽의 장자를 치신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na sumakit sa Egipto sa kanilang mga panganay: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man:
word.maori: ¶ Ki te kaipatu i Ihipa, ara i a ratou matamua: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Kaniya nga naglaglag sa Egipto sa ilang mga panganay; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan;
word.hebrew: י  למכה מצרים בבכוריהם    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: למכה מצרים בבכוריהם כי לעולם חסדו׃

word.kjv: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: และทรงไถ่เราให้พ้นจากศัตรูของเรา เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Y nos rescató de nuestros enemigos, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: e ci ha liberati dai nostri nemici, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: und erlöste uns von unsern Feinden, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: Et nous délivra de nos oppresseurs, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他救我們脫離了敵人，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 우리를 우리 대적에게서 건지신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: At iniligtas tayo sa ating mga kaaway: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man:
word.maori: A whakaorangia ana tatou i o tatou hoariri: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Ug nagluwas kanato gikan sa atong mga kabatok; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaongkalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: כד  ויפרקנו מצרינו    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: ויפרקנו מצרינו כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: พระองค์ผู้ประทานอาหารแก่เนื้อหนังทั้งปวง เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El da mantenimiento á toda carne, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Colui che dà il cibo ad ogni carne, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: der allem Fleisch Speise gibt, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Celui qui donne la nourriture à toute chair, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他把糧食賜給全人類，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 모든 육체에게 식물을 주신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Siya'y nagbibigay ng pagkain sa lahat ng kinapal: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ko ia te kaihomai i te kai ma nga kikokiko katoa: he mau tonu hoki tana inahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Siya nga nagahatag ug makaon sa tanan nga unod; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaongkalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כה  נתן לחם לכל-בשר    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: נתן לחם לכל בשר כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: โอ จงโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระเจ้าแห่งฟ้าสวรรค์ เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Alabad al Dios de los cielos: Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Celebrate l’Iddio dei cieli, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Dankt dem Gott des Himmels, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Louez le Dieu des cieux, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要稱謝天上的　神，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 하늘의 하나님께 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이로다
word.tagalog: Oh mangagpasalamat kayo sa Dios ng langit: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Whakawhetai ki te Atua o te rangi: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Oh paghatag ug mga pasalamat ngadto sa Dios sa langit; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaongkalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כו  הודו לאל השמים    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הודו לאל השמים כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงให้สำเร็จพระประสงค์ของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์ ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์ ขออย่าทรงละทิ้งพระหัตถกิจของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Jehová cumplirá por mí: Tu misericordia, oh Jehová, es para siempre; No dejarás la obra de tus manos.
word.latinvulgate: Si ascendero in cælum, tu illic es ; si descendero in infernum, ades.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno compirà in mio favore l’opera sua; la tua benignità, o Eterno, dura in perpetuo; non abbandonare le opere delle tue mani.
word.german1912: Der HERR wird's für mich vollführen. HERR, deine Güte ist ewig. Das Werk deiner Hände wollest du nicht lassen.
word.french1910: L'Eternel agira en ma faveur. Eternel, ta bonté dure toujours, N'abandonne pas les oeuvres de tes mains!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華必成全關乎我的事；耶和華啊！你的慈愛永遠長存，求你不要離棄你手所造的。
word.korean: 여호와께서 내게 관계된 것을 완전케 하실지라 여호와여, 주의 인자하심이 영원하오니 주의 손으로 지으신 것을 버리지 마옵소서
word.tagalog: Pasasakdalin ng Panginoon ang tungkol sa akin: ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ay magpakailan man; huwag mong pabayaan ang mga gawa ng iyong sariling mga kamay.
word.maori: Ma Ihowa e whakaoti aku mea: e Ihowa, e mau ana tau mahi tohu ake ake; kaua e whakarerea nga mahi a ou ringa.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova magahingpit niadtong tanan nga mahitungod kanako; Ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot, Oh Jehova, nagapadayon sa walay katapusan; Ayaw pagbiyai ang mga buhat sa imong kaugalingong mga kamot.
word.hebrew: ח  יהוה יגמר בעדי    יהוה חסדך לעולם מעשי ידיך אל-תרף
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה יגמר בעדי יהוה חסדך לעולם מעשי ידיך אל תרף׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἀναβῶ εἰς τὸν οὐρανόν σὺ εἶ ἐκεῖ ἐὰν καταβῶ εἰς τὸν ᾅδην πάρει

word.kjv: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
word.thailand: และขอทรงตัดศัตรูของข้าพระองค์ออกไปตามความเมตตาของพระองค์ และขอทรงทำลายบรรดาผู้ที่ทรมานจิตใจข้าพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์เป็นผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y por tu misericordia disiparás mis enemigos, Y destruirás todos los adversarios de mi alma: Porque yo soy tu siervo.
word.latinvulgate: Quorum filii sicut novellæ plantationes in juventute sua ; filiæ eorum compositæ, circumornatæ ut similitudo templi.
word.italian1927: E nella tua benignità distruggi i miei nemici, e fa’ perire tutti quelli che affliggono l’anima mia; perché io son tuo servitore.
word.german1912: und verstöre meine Feinde um deiner Güte willen und bringe alle um, die meine Seele ängsten; denn ich bin dein Knecht.
word.french1910: Dans ta bonté, anéantis mes ennemis, Et fais périr tous les oppresseurs de mon âme! Car je suis ton serviteur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你因你的慈愛使我的仇敵滅絕，求你消滅所有苦害我的人，因為我是你的僕人。
word.korean: 주의 인자하심으로 나의 원수들을 끊으시고 내 영혼을 괴롭게 하는 자를 다 멸하소서 나는 주의 종이니이다
word.tagalog: At sa iyong kagandahang-loob ay ihiwalay mo ang aking mga kaaway, at lipulin mo ang lahat na nagsisidalamhati sa aking kaluluwa; sapagka't ako'y iyong lingkod.
word.maori: Aroha mai hoki, a huna oku hoariri: whakangaromia katoatia ano nga kaitukino o toku wairua: he pononga hoki ahau nau.
word.cebuano: Ug diha sa imong mahigugmaongkalolot, putla ang akong mga kaaway, Ug laglaga silang tanan nga nanagsakit sa akong kalag; Kay ako mao ang imong alagad.
word.hebrew: יב  ובחסדך תצמית איבי    והאבדת כל-צררי נפשי--כי אני עבדך
word.hebrewmodern: ובחסדך תצמית איבי והאבדת כל צררי נפשי כי אני עבדך׃
word.greekot: ὧν οἱ υἱοὶ ὡς νεόφυτα ἡδρυμμένα ἐν τῇ νεότητι αὐτῶν αἱ θυγατέρες αὐτῶν κεκαλλωπισμέναι περικεκοσμημέναι ὡς ὁμοίωμα ναοῦ

word.kjv: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงพระเมตตาและทรงเต็มไปด้วยพระกรุณา ทรงกริ้วช้าและมีความเมตตาอย่างอุดม
word.spanish1909: Clemente y misericordioso es Jehová, Lento para la ira, y grande en misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus illuminat cæcos. Dominus erigit elisos ; Dominus diligit justos.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è misericordioso e pieno di compassione, lento all’ira e di gran benignità.
word.german1912: Gnädig und barmherzig ist der HERR, geduldig und von großer Güte.
word.french1910: L'Eternel est miséricordieux et compatissant, Lent à la colère et plein de bonté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華有恩典有憐憫，不輕易發怒，大有慈愛。
word.korean: 여호와는 은혜로우시며, 자비하시며, 노하기를 더디하시며, 인자하심이 크시도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay mapagbiyaya, at puspos ng kahabagan; banayad sa pagkagalit, at dakila sa kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: He atawhai a Ihowa, he aroha: he puhoi ki te riri, he nui tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Puno sa gracia ug maloloy-on si Jehova; Mahinay sa pagkasuko, ug daku sa mahigugmaong-kalolot.
word.hebrew: ח  חנון ורחום יהוה    ארך אפים וגדל-חסד
word.hebrewmodern: חנון ורחום יהוה ארך אפים וגדל חסד׃
word.greekot: κύριος ἀνορθοῖ κατερραγμένους κύριος σοφοῖ τυφλούς κύριος ἀγαπᾷ δικαίους

word.kjv: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
word.thailand: แต่พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงปรีดีในคนที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ ในคนที่ความหวังของเขาอยู่ในความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Complácese Jehová en los que le temen, Y en los que esperan en su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’Eterno prende piacere in quelli che lo temono, in quelli che sperano nella sua benignità.
word.german1912: Der HERR hat Gefallen an denen, die ihn fürchten, die auf seine Güte hoffen.
word.french1910: L'Eternel aime ceux qui le craignent, Ceux qui espèrent en sa bonté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華喜悅敬畏他的人，喜悅仰望他慈愛的人。
word.korean: 자기를 경외하는 자와 그 인자하심을 바라는 자들을 기뻐하시는도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay naliligaya sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya, sa nagsisiasa sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: E manako ana a Ihowa ki te hunga e wehi ana i a ia, ki te hunga e tumanako ana ki tona aroha.
word.cebuano: Ang kalipay ni Jehova anaa kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya, Anaa niadtong mga nagalaum sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot.
word.hebrew: יא  רוצה יהוה את-יראיו--    את-המיחלים לחסדו
word.hebrewmodern: רוצה יהוה את יראיו את המיחלים לחסדו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart:
word.thailand: อย่าให้ความเมตตาและความจริงทอดทิ้งเจ้า จงผูกมันไว้ที่คอของเจ้า จงเขียนมันไว้ที่แผ่นจารึกแห่งหัวใจของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Misericordia y verdad no te desamparen; Atalas á tu cuello, Escríbelas en la tabla de tu corazón:
word.latinvulgate: Misericordia et veritas te non deserant ; circumda eas gutturi tuo, et describe in tabulis cordis tui ;
word.italian1927: Bontà e verità non ti abbandonino; lègatele al collo, scrivile sulla tavola del tuo cuore;
word.german1912: Gnade und Treue werden dich nicht lassen. Hänge sie an deinen Hals und schreibe sie auf die Tafel deines Herzens,
word.french1910: Que la bonté et la fidélité ne t'abandonnent pas; Lie-les à ton cou, écris-les sur la table de ton coeur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不可讓慈愛誠實離開你，要繫在你的頸項上，刻在你的心版上。
word.korean: 인자와 진리로 네게서 떠나지 않게 하고 그것을 네 목에 매며 네 마음판에 새기라
word.tagalog: Huwag kang pabayaan ng kaawaan at katotohanan: itali mo sa palibot ng iyong leeg; ikintal mo sa iyong puso:
word.maori: Kei whakarerea koe e te atawhai, e te pono; heia ki tou kaki; tuhituhia iho, ko tou ngakau ano hei papa.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pagpabiyaa kanimo ang kalolot ug kamatuoran: Ihigot mo sila sa imong liog; Isulat mo sila ibabaw sa papan sa imong kasingkasing:
word.hebrew: ג  חסד ואמת    אל-יעזבך קשרם על-גרגרותיך    כתבם על-לוח לבך
word.hebrewmodern: חסד ואמת אל יעזבך קשרם על גרגרותיך כתבם על לוח לבך׃
word.greekot: ἐλεημοσύναι καὶ πίστεις μὴ ἐκλιπέτωσάν σε ἄφαψαι δὲ αὐτὰς ἐπὶ σῷ τραχήλῳ καὶ εὑρήσεις χάριν

word.kjv: He that despiseth his neighbour sinneth: but he that hath mercy on the poor, happy is he.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่ดูหมิ่นเพื่อนบ้านของตนก็ทำบาป แต่บุคคลที่เอ็นดูคนยากจนก็เป็นสุข
word.spanish1909: Peca el que menosprecia á su prójimo: Mas el que tiene misericordia de los pobres, es bienaventurado.
word.latinvulgate: Qui despicit proximum suum peccat ; qui autem miseretur pauperis beatus erit. Qui credit in Domino misericordiam diligit.
word.italian1927: Chi sprezza il prossimo pecca, ma beato chi ha pietà dei miseri!
word.german1912: Der Sünder verachtet seinen Nächsten; aber wohl dem, der sich der Elenden erbarmt!
word.french1910: Celui qui méprise son prochain commet un péché, Mais heureux celui qui a pitié des misérables!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 藐視鄰舍的，是為有罪；恩待貧窮人的，是為有福。
word.korean: 그 이웃을 업신여기는 자는 죄를 범하는 자요 빈곤한 자를 불쌍히 여기는 자는 복이 있는 자니라
word.tagalog: Siyang humahamak sa kaniyang kapuwa ay nagkakasala: nguni't siyang naaawa sa dukha ay mapalad siya.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e whakahawea ana ki tona hoa, e hara ana; ko te tangata ia e atawhai ana ki nga rawakore, ka hari.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagatamay sa iyang isigkatawo nagapakasala; Apan kadtong may kalooy sa ka bus, malipayon siya.
word.hebrew: כא  בז-לרעהו חוטא    ומחונן עניים (ענוים) אשריו
word.hebrewmodern: בז לרעהו חוטא ומחונן עניים אשריו׃
word.greekot: ὁ ἀτιμάζων πένητας ἁμαρτάνει ἐλεῶν δὲ πτωχοὺς μακαριστός

word.kjv: Do they not err that devise evil? but mercy and truth shall be to them that devise good.
word.thailand: คนที่คิดการชั่วนั้นไม่ผิดหรือ บรรดาผู้ที่คิดการดีก็จะพบความเมตตาและความจริง
word.spanish1909: ¿No yerran los que piensan mal? Misericordia empero y verdad alcanzarán los que piensan bien.
word.latinvulgate: Errant qui operantur malum ; misericordia et veritas præparant bona.
word.italian1927: Quelli che meditano il male non son forse traviati? ma quelli che meditano il bene trovan grazia e fedeltà.
word.german1912: Die mit bösen Ränken umgehen, werden fehlgehen; die aber Gutes denken, denen wird Treue und Güte widerfahren.
word.french1910: Ceux qui méditent le mal ne s'égarent-ils pas? Mais ceux qui méditent le bien agissent avec bonté et fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 圖謀惡事的，不是走錯了嗎？謀求善事的，必得慈愛和誠實。
word.korean: 악을 도모하는 자는 그릇 가는 것이 아니냐 선을 도모하는 자에게는 인자와 진리가 있으리라
word.tagalog: Hindi ba sila nagkakamali na kumakatha ng kasamaan? Nguni't kaawaan at katotohanan ay sasa kanila na nagsisikatha ng mabuti.
word.maori: ¶ He teka ianei e kotiti ke ana nga kaiwhakatakoto i te kino? He atawhai ia, he pono, kei nga kaihanga i te pai.
word.cebuano: Wala ba mangasayup kadtong nagamugna ug dautan? Apan ang puangod ug kamatuoran anaa kanila nga nagamugna ug maayo.
word.hebrew: כב  הלוא-יתעו חרשי רע    וחסד ואמת חרשי טוב
word.hebrewmodern: הלוא יתעו חרשי רע וחסד ואמת חרשי טוב׃
word.greekot: πλανώμενοι τεκταίνουσι κακά ἔλεον δὲ καὶ ἀλήθειαν τεκταίνουσιν ἀγαθοί οὐκ ἐπίστανται ἔλεον καὶ πίστιν τέκτονες κακῶν ἐλεημοσύναι δὲ καὶ πίστεις παρὰ τέκτοσιν ἀγαθοῖς

word.kjv: He that oppresseth the poor reproacheth his Maker: but he that honoureth him hath mercy on the poor.
word.thailand: บุคคลผู้บีบบังคับคนยากจน ดูถูกพระผู้สร้างของเขา แต่บุคคลที่ถวายเกียรติแด่พระองค์ก็เอ็นดูต่อคนขัดสน
word.spanish1909: El que oprime al pobre, afrenta á su Hacedor: Mas el que tiene misericordia del pobre, lo honra.
word.latinvulgate: Qui calumniatur egentem exprobrat factori ejus, honorat autem eum qui miseretur pauperis.
word.italian1927: Chi opprime il povero oltraggia Colui che l’ha fatto, ma chi ha pietà del bisognoso, l’onora.
word.german1912: Wer dem Geringen Gewalt tut, der lästert desselben Schöpfer; aber wer sich des Armen erbarmt, der ehrt Gott.
word.french1910: Opprimer le pauvre, c'est outrager celui qui l'a fait; Mais avoir pitié de l'indigent, c'est l'honorer.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 欺壓貧寒的，就是辱罵造他的主；恩待窮苦人的，就是尊敬造他的主。
word.korean: 가난한 사람을 학대하는 자는 그를 지으신 이를 멸시하는 자요 궁핍한 사람을 불쌍히 여기는 자는 주를 존경하는 자니라
word.tagalog: Siyang pumipighati sa dukha ay humahamak sa Maylalang sa kaniya. Nguni't siyang naaawa sa mapagkailangan ay nagpaparangal sa kaniya.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e tukino ana i te ware, he tawai tana ki tona Kaihanga; ko te tangata ia e atawhai ana i te rawakore, e whakahonore ana i a ia.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagadagmal sa kabus nagatamay sa iyang Magbubuhat; Apan kadtong may kalooy sa hangul nagatahud kaniya,
word.hebrew: לא  עשק דל חרף עשהו    ומכבדו חנן אביון
word.hebrewmodern: עשק דל חרף עשהו ומכבדו חנן אביון׃
word.greekot: ὁ συκοφαντῶν πένητα παροξύνει τὸν ποιήσαντα αὐτόν ὁ δὲ τιμῶν αὐτὸν ἐλεᾷ πτωχόν

word.kjv: By mercy and truth iniquity is purged: and by the fear of the LORD men depart from evil.
word.thailand: ความเมตตาและความจริงได้ลบความชั่วช้า และคนหลีกความชั่วร้ายได้โดยความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Con misericordia y verdad se corrige el pecado: Y con el temor de Jehová se apartan del mal los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: Misericordia et veritate redimitur iniquitas, et in timore Domini declinatur a malo.
word.italian1927: Con la bontà e con la fedeltà l’iniquità si espia, e col timor dell’Eterno si evita il male.
word.german1912: Durch Güte und Treue wird Missetat versöhnt, und durch die Furcht des HERRN meidet man das Böse.
word.french1910: Par la bonté et la fidélité on expie l'iniquité, Et par la crainte de l'Eternel on se détourne du mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因著憐憫和信實，罪孽得到遮蓋；因為敬畏耶和華，人可以避開罪惡。
word.korean: 인자와 진리로 인하여 죄악이 속하게 되고 여호와를 경외함으로 인하여 악에서 떠나게 되느니라
word.tagalog: Sa pamamagitan ng kaawaan at katotohanan ay nalilinis ang kasamaan: at sa pamamagitan ng pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay humihiwalay ang mga tao sa kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te mahi tohu tangata me te pono hei pure mo te kino; ma te wehi hoki ki a Ihowa ka mawehe atu ai te tangata i te kino.
word.cebuano: Tungod sa kalooy ug sa kamatuoran ang kasal-anan may pagtabon-sa-sala; Ug tungod sa pagkahadlok kang Jehova ang mga tawo mobiya gikan sa dautan.
word.hebrew: ו  בחסד ואמת יכפר עון    וביראת יהוה סור מרע
word.hebrewmodern: בחסד ואמת יכפר עון וביראת יהוה סור מרע׃
word.greekot: μαντεῖον ἐπὶ χείλεσιν βασιλέως ἐν δὲ κρίσει οὐ μὴ πλανηθῇ τὸ στόμα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Mercy and truth preserve the king: and his throne is upholden by mercy.
word.thailand: ความเมตตาและความจริงสงวนกษัตริย์ไว้ และความเมตตาก็เชิดชูพระที่นั่งของพระองค์ไว้
word.spanish1909: Misericordia y verdad guardan al rey; Y con clemencia sustenta su trono.
word.latinvulgate: Misericordia et veritas custodiunt regem, et roboratur clementia thronus ejus.
word.italian1927: La bontà e la fedeltà custodiscono il re; e con la bontà egli rende stabile il suo trono.
word.german1912: Fromm und wahrhaftig sein behütet den König, und sein Thron besteht durch Frömmigkeit.
word.french1910: La bonté et la fidélité gardent le roi, Et il soutient son trône par la bonté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 慈愛和信實保護君王，他的王位也藉慈愛維持。
word.korean: 왕은 인자와 진리로 스스로 보호하고 그 위도 인자함으로 말미암아 견고하니라
word.tagalog: Kagandahang-loob at katotohanan ay nagpapalagi sa hari: at ang kaniyang luklukan ay inaalalayan ng kagandahang-loob.
word.maori: ¶ Hei kaitiaki mo te kingi te atawhai me te pono; e tautokona ake ana hoki tona torona e te atawhai.
word.cebuano: Kalooy ug kamatuoran nagapanalipod sa hari; Ug ang iyang trono ginatuboy tungod sa kalolot.
word.hebrew: כח  חסד ואמת יצרו-מלך    וסעד בחסד כסאו
word.hebrewmodern: חסד ואמת יצרו מלך וסעד בחסד כסאו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.
word.thailand: บุคคลผู้ตามติดความชอบธรรมและความเอ็นดู จะพบชีวิตและความชอบธรรมกับเกียรติยศ
word.spanish1909: El que sigue la justicia y la misericordia, Hallará la vida, la justicia, y la honra.
word.latinvulgate: Qui sequitur justitiam et misericordiam inveniet vitam, justitiam, et gloriam.
word.italian1927: Chi ricerca la giustizia e la bontà troverà vita, giustizia e gloria.
word.german1912: Wer der Gerechtigkeit und Güte nachjagt, der findet Leben, Gerechtigkeit und Ehre.
word.french1910: Celui qui poursuit la justice et la bonté Trouve la vie, la justice et la gloire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 追求公義與慈愛的，必得著生命、公義和榮耀。
word.korean: 의와 인자를 따라 구하는 자는 생명과 의와 영광을 얻느니라
word.tagalog: Ang sumusunod sa katuwiran at kagandahang-loob nakakasumpong ng buhay, katuwiran, at karangalan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e whai ana i te tika, i te atawhai, ka whiwhi ki te ora, ki te tika, ki te honore.
word.cebuano: Kadtong magasunod sa pagkamatarung ug sa kalolot Makakaplag sa kinabuhi, pagkamatarung, ug kadungganan.
word.hebrew: כא  רדף צדקה וחסד--    ימצא חיים צדקה וכבוד
word.hebrewmodern: רדף צדקה וחסד ימצא חיים צדקה וכבוד׃
word.greekot: πόλεις ὀχυρὰς ἐπέβη σοφὸς καὶ καθεῖλεν τὸ ὀχύρωμα ἐφ' ᾧ ἐπεποίθεισαν οἱ ἀσεβεῖς

word.kjv: He that covereth his sins shall not prosper: but whoso confesseth and forsaketh them shall have mercy.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่ซ่อนความบาปของตนจะไม่จำเริญ แต่บุคคลที่สารภาพและทิ้งความชั่วเสียจะได้ความกรุณา
word.spanish1909: El que encubre sus pecados, no prosperará: Mas el que los confiesa y se aparta, alcanzará misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Qui abscondit scelera sua non dirigetur ; qui autem confessus fuerit et reliquerit ea, misericordiam consequetur.
word.italian1927: Chi copre le sue trasgressioni non prospererà, ma chi le confessa e le abbandona otterrà misericordia.
word.german1912: Wer seine Missetat leugnet, dem wird's nicht gelingen; wer sie aber bekennt und läßt, der wird Barmherzigkeit erlangen.
word.french1910: Celui qui cache ses transgressions ne prospère point, Mais celui qui les avoue et les délaisse obtient miséricorde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 遮掩自己過犯的，必不亨通；承認並離棄過犯的，必蒙憐憫。
word.korean: 자기의 죄를 숨기는 자는 형통치 못하나 죄를 자복하고 버리는 자는 불쌍히 여김을 받으리라
word.tagalog: Siyang nagtatakip ng kaniyang mga pagsalangsang ay hindi giginhawa: nguni't ang nagpapahayag at nagiiwan ng mga yaon ay magtatamo ng kaawaan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e hipoki ana i ona he, e kore tana e kake; ko te tangata ia e whaki ana, a e whakarere ana, ka tohungia.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagatabon sa iyang kalapasan dili mouswag; Apan bisan kinsa nga nagasugid ug nagabiya kanila makadawat ug kalooy.
word.hebrew: יג  מכסה פשעיו לא יצליח    ומודה ועזב ירחם
word.hebrewmodern: מכסה פשעיו לא יצליח ומודה ועזב ירחם׃
word.greekot: ὁ ἐπικαλύπτων ἀσέβειαν ἑαυτοῦ οὐκ εὐοδωθήσεται ὁ δὲ ἐξηγούμενος ἐλέγχους ἀγαπηθήσεται

word.kjv: Therefore the Lord shall have no joy in their young men, neither shall have mercy on their fatherless and widows: for every one is an hypocrite and an evildoer, and every mouth speaketh folly. For all this his anger is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.
word.thailand: ฉะนั้นองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าจะหาทรงเปรมปรีดิ์ในคนหนุ่มของเขาไม่ และจะมิได้ทรงมีพระกรุณาต่อคนกำพร้าพ่อหรือหญิงม่ายของเขา เพราะว่าทุกคนเป็นคนหน้าซื่อใจคดและเป็นคนทำความชั่วและปากทุกปากก็กล่าวคำโฉดเขลา ถึงกระนั้นก็ดีพระพิโรธของพระองค์ก็ยังมิได้หันกลับ และพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ยังเหยียดออกอยู่
word.spanish1909: Por tanto, el Señor no tomará contentamiento en sus mancebos, ni de sus huérfanos y viudas tendrá misericordia: porque todos son falsos y malignos, y toda boca habla despropósitos. Con todo esto no ha cesado su furor, antes todavía su mano extendida.
word.latinvulgate: Propter hoc super adolescentulis ejus non lætabitur Dominus, et pupillorum ejus et viduarum non miserebitur : quia omnis hypocrita est et nequam, et universum os locutum est stultitiam ; in omnibus his non est aversus furor ejus, sed adhuc manus ejus extenta.
word.italian1927: (H9-16) Perciò l’Eterno non si compiacerà de’ giovani del popolo, né avrà compassione de’ suoi orfani e delle sue vedove; poiché tutti quanti son empi e perversi, ed ogni bocca proferisce follia. E, con tutto ciò, la sua ira non si calma, e la sua mano rimane distesa.
word.german1912: Darum kann sich der HERR über die junge Mannschaft nicht freuen noch ihrer Waisen und Witwen erbarmen; denn sie sind allzumal Heuchler und böse, und aller Mund redet Torheit. In dem allem läßt sein Zorn noch nicht ab; seine Hand ist noch ausgereckt.
word.french1910: C'est pourquoi le Seigneur ne saurait se réjouir de leurs jeunes hommes, Ni avoir pitié de leurs orphelins et de leurs veuves; Car tous sont des impies et des méchants, Et toutes les bouches profèrent des infamies. Malgré tout cela, sa colère ne s'apaise point, Et sa main est encore étendue.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，主不喜歡他們的年輕人，也不憐恤他們的孤兒寡婦；因為他們各人都是不敬虔的，是邪惡的，各人的口都說愚昧的話。雖然這樣，耶和華的怒氣還沒有轉消，他的手仍然伸出。
word.korean: 이 백성이 각기 설만하며 악을 행하며 입으로 망령되이 말하니 그러므로 주께서 그 장정을 기뻐 아니하시며 그 고아와 과부를 긍휼히 여기지 아니하시리라 그럴지라도 여호와의 노가 쉬지 아니하며 그 손이 여전히 펴지리라
word.tagalog: Kaya't ang Panginoon ay hindi magagalak sa kanilang mga binata, ni mahahabag man sa kanilang mga ulila at mga babaing bao: sapagka't bawa't isa ay marumi at manggagawa ng kasamaan, at bawa't bibig ay nagsasalita ng kamangmangan. Sa lahat na ito ang galit niya ay hindi napawi, kundi ang kaniyang kamay ay laging nakaunat.
word.maori: Mo reira kahore o te Ariki koa ki a ratou taitamariki, e kore ano e tohungia a ratou pani, a ratou pouaru; no te mea he noa ratou katoa, he kaimahi i te kino, he wairangi te korero a nga mangai katoa. Ahakoa ko tenei katoa, e kore tona riri e ta huri ke, engari maro tonu tona ringa.
word.cebuano: Tungod niini ang Ginoo dili malipay sa ilang mga batan-on nga lalake, ni malooy siya sa ilang mga ilo ug mga balo; kay ang tanan mahugaw ug mamumuhat sa dautan, ug ang tagsatagsa ka baba nagasulti sa binuang. Mahitungod niining tanan ang iyang kasuko wala mapala, kondili gibakyaw hinoon ang iyang kamot sa gihapon.
word.hebrew: יז כי בערה כאש רשעה שמיר ושית תאכל ותצת בסבכי היער ויתאבכו גאות עשן
word.hebrewmodern: על כן על בחוריו לא ישמח אדני ואת יתמיו ואת אלמנתיו לא ירחם כי כלו חנף ומרע וכל פה דבר נבלה בכל זאת לא שב אפו ועוד ידו נטויה׃
word.greekot: καὶ καυθήσεται ὡς πῦρ ἡ ἀνομία καὶ ὡς ἄγρωστις ξηρὰ βρωθήσεται ὑπὸ πυρός καὶ καυθήσεται ἐν τοῖς δάσεσι τοῦ δρυμοῦ καὶ συγκαταφάγεται τὰ κύκλῳ τῶν βουνῶν πάντα

word.kjv: For the LORD will have mercy on Jacob, and will yet choose Israel, and set them in their own land: and the strangers shall be joined with them, and they shall cleave to the house of Jacob.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงมีพระเมตตาต่อยาโคบ และจะทรงเลือกอิสราเอลอีก และจะทรงตั้งเขาทั้งหลายไว้ในแผ่นดินของเขาเอง คนต่างด้าวจะสมทบกับเขา และติดพันอยู่กับวงศ์วานของยาโคบ
word.spanish1909: PORQUE Jehová tendrá piedad de Jacob, y todavía escogerá á Israel, y les hará reposar en su tierra: y á ellos se unirán extranjeros, y allegaránse á la familia de Jacob.
word.latinvulgate: Prope est ut veniat tempus ejus, et dies ejus non elongabuntur. Miserebitur enim Dominus Jacob, et eliget adhuc de Israël, et requiescere eos faciet super humum suam ; adjungetur advena ad eos, et adhærebit domui Jacob.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno avrà pietà di Giacobbe, sceglierà ancora Israele, e li ristabilirà sul loro suolo; lo straniero s’unirà ad essi, e si stringerà alla casa di Giacobbe.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR wird sich über Jakob erbarmen und Israel noch fürder erwählen und sie in ihr Land setzen. Und Fremdlinge werden sich zu ihnen tun und dem Hause Jakob anhangen.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel aura pitié de Jacob, Il choisira encore Israël, Et il les rétablira dans leur pays; Les étrangers se joindront à eux, Et ils s'uniront à la maison de Jacob.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列重歸故土耶和華憐憫雅各，再揀選以色列，使他們安居在自己的國土上的時候，外族人必與他們聯合，歸屬於雅各家。
word.korean: 여호와께서 야곱을 긍휼히 여기시며 이스라엘을 다시 택하여 자기 고토에 두시리니 나그네 된 자가 야곱 족속에게 가입되어 그들과 연합할 것이며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay maaawa sa Jacob, at kaniyang pipiliin pa ang Israel, at ilalagay sila sa kanilang sariling lupain: at ang taga ibang lupa ay lalakip sa kanila, at sila'y masasanib sa sangbahayan ni Jacob.
word.maori: ¶ No te mea ka aroha a Ihowa ki a Hakopa, ka whiriwhiria ano a Iharaira e ia; ka meinga hoki ratou kia ata noho ki to ratou ake oneone; ka piri ano te tangata ke ki a ratou, ka uru ano hoki ki roto ki te whare o Hakopa.
word.cebuano: Kay malooy si Jehova kang Jacob, ug pagapilion pa niya ang Israel, ug igapahaluna sila sa ilang kaugalingong yuta: ug ang lumalangyaw makigtipon uban kanila, ug sila motipon sa balay ni Jacob.
word.hebrew: א כי ירחם יהוה את יעקב ובחר עוד בישראל והניחם על אדמתם ונלוה הגר עליהם ונספחו על בית יעקב
word.hebrewmodern: כי ירחם יהוה את יעקב ובחר עוד בישראל והניחם על אדמתם ונלוה הגר עליהם ונספחו על בית יעקב׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐλεήσει κύριος τὸν ιακωβ καὶ ἐκλέξεται ἔτι τὸν ισραηλ καὶ ἀναπαύσονται ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς αὐτῶν καὶ ὁ γιώρας προστεθήσεται πρὸς αὐτοὺς καὶ προστεθήσεται πρὸς τὸν οἶκον ιακωβ

word.kjv: And in mercy shall the throne be established: and he shall sit upon it in truth in the tabernacle of David, judging, and seeking judgment, and hasting righteousness.
word.thailand: พระที่นั่งก็จะได้รับการสถาปนาด้วยความเมตตา บนนั้นจะมีผู้หนึ่งนั่งอยู่ด้วยความจริงในเต็นท์ของดาวิด คือท่านผู้พิพากษาและแสวงความยุติธรรม และรวดเร็วในการกระทำความชอบธรรม"
word.spanish1909: Y dispondráse trono en misericordia; y sobre él se sentará firmemente, en el tabernáculo de David, quien juzgue y busque el juicio, y apresure la justicia.
word.latinvulgate: Et præparabitur in misericordia solium, et sedebit super illud in veritate in tabernaculo David, judicans et quærens judicium, et velociter reddens quod justum est.
word.italian1927: il trono è stabilito fermamente sulla clemenza, e sul trono sta assiso fedelmente, nella tenda di Davide, un giudice amico del diritto, e pronto a far giustizia".
word.german1912: Es wird aber ein Stuhl bereitet werden aus Gnaden, daß einer darauf sitze in der Wahrheit, in der Hütte Davids, und richte und trachte nach Recht und fördere Gerechtigkeit.
word.french1910: Et le trône s'affermira par la clémence; Et l'on y verra siéger fidèlement, dans la maison de David, Un juge ami du droit et zélé pour la justice. -
word.chinesencvtraditional: 必有一個寶座在慈愛中建立；必有一位憑信實坐在上面，就是在大衛的帳棚裡；他必施行審判，尋求公平，並且迅速行公義。”
word.korean: 다윗의 장막에 왕위는 인자함으로 굳게 설 것이요 그 위에 앉을 자는 충실함으로 판결하며 공평을 구하며 의를 신속히 행하리라
word.tagalog: At ang luklukan ay matatatag sa kagandahang-loob, at isa'y uupo roon sa katotohanan, sa tabernakulo ni David; na humahatol at humahanap ng kahatulan, at nagmamadaling nagsasagawa ng katuwiran.
word.maori: A ka whakapumautia he torona i runga i te tohu tangata: ka nohoia e tetahi i runga i te pono, i roto ano i te teneti o Rawiri; me te whakawa, me te rapu i te tikanga o te whakawa, he hohoro hoki ki te mahi i te tika.
word.cebuano: Ug usa ka trono pagatukoron diha sa mahigugmaong kalolot; ug adunay usa nga molingkod niini sa kamatuoran, sa balong-balong ni David nga magahukom, ug magapangita sa justicia, ug maabtik nga mobuhat sa pagkamatarung.
word.hebrew: ה והוכן בחסד כסא וישב עליו באמת באהל דוד שפט ודרש משפט ומהר צדק
word.hebrewmodern: והוכן בחסד כסא וישב עליו באמת באהל דוד שפט ודרש משפט ומהר צדק׃
word.greekot: καὶ διορθωθήσεται μετ' ἐλέους θρόνος καὶ καθίεται ἐπ' αὐτοῦ μετὰ ἀληθείας ἐν σκηνῇ δαυιδ κρίνων καὶ ἐκζητῶν κρίμα καὶ σπεύδων δικαιοσύνην

word.kjv: When the boughs thereof are withered, they shall be broken off: the women come, and set them on fire: for it is a people of no understanding: therefore he that made them will not have mercy on them, and he that formed them will shew them no favour.
word.thailand: เมื่อกิ่งนั้นแห้ง มันก็จะถูกหัก พวกผู้หญิงก็มาเอามันไปก่อไฟ เพราะนี่เป็นชนชาติที่ไร้ความเข้าใจ เพราะฉะนั้นผู้ที่ทรงสร้างเขาก็จะไม่สงสารเขา ผู้ที่ทรงปั้นเขาจะไม่ทรงสำแดงพระคุณแก่เขา
word.spanish1909: Cuando sus ramas se secaren, serán quebradas; mujeres vendrán á encenderlas: porque aquél no es pueblo de entendimiento; por tanto su Hacedor no tendrá de él misericordia, ni se compadecerá de él el que lo formó.
word.latinvulgate: In siccitate messes illius conterentur. Mulieres venientes, et docentes eam ; non est enim populus sapiens : propterea non miserebitur ejus qui fecit eum, et qui formavit eum non parcet ei.
word.italian1927: Quando i rami saran secchi, saran rotti; e verranno le donne a bruciarli; poiché è un popolo senza intelligenza; perciò Colui che l’ha fatto non ne avrà compassione. Colui che l’ha formato non gli farà grazia.
word.german1912: Ihre Zweige werden vor Dürre brechen, daß die Weiber kommen und Feuer damit machen werden; denn es ist ein unverständiges Volk. Darum wird sich auch ihrer nicht erbarmen, der sie gemacht hat; und der sie geschaffen hat, wird ihnen nicht gnädig sein.
word.french1910: Quand les rameaux sèchent, on les brise; Des femmes viennent, pour les brûler. C'était un peuple sans intelligence: Aussi celui qui l'a fait n'a point eu pitié de lui, Celui qui l'a formé ne lui a point fait grâce.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列民回歸枝條枯乾了，就必被折斷；婦女必來，拿去生火，因為這人民愚昧無知，所以他們的創造主不憐憫他們，那造成他們的，不向他們施恩。
word.korean: 너희는 유다 왕 히스기야에게 이같이 고하여 이르기를 너는 너의 의뢰하는 하나님이 예루살렘이 앗수르 왕의 손에 넘어가지 아니하리라 하는 말에 속지 말라
word.tagalog: Pagka ang mga sanga niyaon ay nangatuyo, babaliin; paroroonan ng mga babae at igagatong sa apoy: sapagka't bayan na walang unawa; kaya't ang gumawa sa kanila ay hindi magdadalang habag sa kanila, at ang naganyo sa kanila ay hindi magpapakita sa kanila ng lingap.
word.maori: Ka memenge ona peka, ka whatiia atu: ka haere mai nga wahine, tahuna ana e ratou ki te ahi; ehara hoki ia i te iwi e whai mahara ana: no reira e kore ratou e tohungia e to ratou kaihanga, e kore ano to ratou kaiwhakaahua e aroha ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Sa diha nga ang mga sanga niini mangalaya, sila mangaputol; ang mga babaye manganhi ug magadaub kanila; kay kini maoy usa ka katawohan nga walay salabutan: tungod niini siya nga nagbuhat kanila, dili magabaton ug kalooy kanila, ug siya nga maoy nag-umol kanila, dili mopakita kanila ug kalooy.
word.hebrew: יא ביבש קצירה תשברנה נשים באות מאירות אותה  כי לא עם בינות הוא--על כן לא ירחמנו עשהו ויצרו לא יחננו  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ביבש קצירה תשברנה נשים באות מאירות אותה כי לא עם בינות הוא על כן לא ירחמנו עשהו ויצרו לא יחננו׃
word.greekot: καὶ μετὰ χρόνον οὐκ ἔσται ἐν αὐτῇ πᾶν χλωρὸν διὰ τὸ ξηρανθῆναι γυναῖκες ἐρχόμεναι ἀπὸ θέας δεῦτε οὐ γὰρ λαός ἐστιν ἔχων σύνεσιν διὰ τοῦτο οὐ μὴ οἰκτιρήσῃ ὁ ποιήσας αὐτούς οὐδὲ ὁ πλάσας αὐτοὺς οὐ μὴ ἐλεήσῃ

word.kjv: And therefore will the LORD wait, that he may be gracious unto you, and therefore will he be exalted, that he may have mercy upon you: for the LORD is a God of judgment: blessed are all they that wait for him.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้นพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงคอยที่จะทรงพระกรุณาเจ้าทั้งหลาย เพราะฉะนั้นพระองค์จึงทรงเป็นที่ยกย่องเพื่อจะเมตตาเจ้า เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นพระเจ้าแห่งความยุติธรรม บรรดาผู้ที่คอยท่าพระองค์จะได้รับพระพร
word.spanish1909: Empero Jehová esperará para tener piedad de vosotros, y por tanto será ensalzado teniendo de vosotros misericordia: porque Jehová es Dios de juicio: bienaventurados todos los que le esperan.
word.latinvulgate: Propterea exspectat Dominus ut misereatur vestri ; et ideo exaltabitur parcens vobis, quia Deus judicii Dominus : beati omnes qui exspectant eum !
word.italian1927: Perciò l’Eterno aspetterà onde farvi grazia, poi si leverà per aver compassione di voi; poiché l’Eterno è un Dio di giustizia. Beati tutti quelli che sperano in lui!
word.german1912: Darum harret der HERR, daß er euch gnädig sei, und hat sich aufgemacht, daß er sich euer erbarme; denn der HERR ist ein Gott des Gerichts. Wohl allen, die sein harren!
word.french1910: Cependant l'Eternel désire vous faire grâce, Et il se lèvera pour vous faire miséricorde; Car l'Eternel est un Dieu juste: Heureux tous ceux qui espèrent en lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 等候　神的必蒙眷顧因此，耶和華必等候要恩待你們；他必興起來憐憫你們，因為耶和華是公義的　神。等候他的，都是有福的。
word.korean: 그러나 여호와께서 기다리시나니 이는 너희에게 은혜를 베풀려 하심이요 일어나시리니 이는 저희를 긍휼히 여기려 하심이라 대저 여호와는 공의의 하나님이심이라 무릇 그를 기다리는 자는 복이 있도다
word.tagalog: At dahil dito maghihintay ang Panginoon, upang siya'y maging mapagbiyaya sa inyo, at kaya't mabubunyi siya, na siya'y magdadalang habag sa inyo: sapagka't ang Panginoon ay Dios ng kahatulan; mapapalad yaong lahat na nangaghihintay sa kaniya.
word.maori: ¶ Na konei ano a Ihowa ka tatari, he mea kia atawhaitia ai koutou e ia, na konei ano ia ka whakanekehia ake, kia tohungia ai koutou e ia: he Atua whakawa hoki a Ihowa, ka hari te hunga katoa e tatari ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Ug tungod niini si Jehova magahulat, aron siya magmaloloy-on kaninyo; ug tungod niini pagabayawon siya aron siya adunay puangod kaninyo: kay si Jehova mao ang Dios sa justicia; bulahan kadtong tanan nga nagahulat kaniya.
word.hebrew: יח ולכן יחכה יהוה לחננכם ולכן ירום לרחמכם  כי אלהי משפט יהוה אשרי כל חוכי לו  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ולכן יחכה יהוה לחננכם ולכן ירום לרחמכם כי אלהי משפט יהוה אשרי כל חוכי לו׃
word.greekot: καὶ πάλιν μενεῖ ὁ θεὸς τοῦ οἰκτιρῆσαι ὑμᾶς καὶ διὰ τοῦτο ὑψωθήσεται τοῦ ἐλεῆσαι ὑμᾶς διότι κριτὴς κύριος ὁ θεὸς ἡμῶν ἐστιν καὶ ποῦ καταλείψετε τὴν δόξαν ὑμῶν μακάριοι οἱ ἐμμένοντες ἐν αὐτῷ

word.kjv: I was wroth with my people, I have polluted mine inheritance, and given them into thine hand: thou didst shew them no mercy; upon the ancient hast thou very heavily laid thy yoke.
word.thailand: เรากริ้วต่อชนชาติของเรา เราทำให้มรดกของเราเป็นมลทิน เรามอบเขาไว้ในมือของเจ้า เจ้ามิได้แสดงความกรุณาต่อเขา เจ้าวางแอกอย่างหนักไว้บนบ่าของคนชรา
word.spanish1909: Enojéme contra mi pueblo, profané mi heredad, y entreguélos en tu mano: no les hiciste misericordias; sobre el viejo agravaste mucho tu yugo.
word.latinvulgate: Iratus sum super populum meum, contaminavi hæreditatem meam, et dedi eos in manu tua ; non posuisti eis misericordias, super senem aggravasti jugum tuum valde.
word.italian1927: Io mi corrucciai contro il mio popolo, profanai la mia eredità e li diedi in mano tua; tu non avesti per essi alcuna pietà; facesti gravar duramente il tuo giogo sul vecchio,
word.german1912: Denn da ich über mein Volk zornig war und entweihte mein Erbe, übergab ich sie in deine Hand; aber du bewiesest ihnen keine Barmherzigkeit, auch über die Alten machtest du ein Joch allzu schwer,
word.french1910: J'étais irrité contre mon peuple, J'avais profané mon héritage, Et je les avais livrés entre tes mains: Tu n'as pas eu pour eux de la compassion, Tu as durement appesanti ton joug sur le vieillard.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我曾對我的子民發怒，使我的產業被褻瀆，我把他們交在你的手裡，你卻對他們毫無憐憫。你竟把你的軛，重重壓在老年人的身上。
word.korean: 전에 내가 내 백성을 노함으로 내 기업을 욕되게 하여 그들을 네 손에 붙였거늘 네가 그들을 긍휼히 여기지 아니하고 늙은이에게 네 멍에를 심히 무겁게 메우며
word.tagalog: Ako'y napoot sa aking bayan, aking dinumhan ang aking mana, at ibinigay ko sa iyong kamay: hindi mo pinagpakitaan sila ng kaawaan; sa may katandaan ay pinabigat mong mainam ang iyong atang.
word.maori: I riri ahau ki taku iwi, i whakapokea toku kainga tupu; tukua ana e ahau ki tou ringa; kihai i puta tou aroha ki a ratou, whakataimahatia rawatia iho e koe tau ioka ki te kaumatua.
word.cebuano: Ako naligutgut sa akong katawohan, gipanamastamasan ko ang akong panulondon, ug gihatag nako sila sa imong kamot: ikaw wala magpakita kanila ug kalooy; apan ang tigulang gipahamug-atan mo pag-ayo sa imong yugo.
word.hebrew: ו קצפתי על עמי חללתי נחלתי ואתנם בידך לא שמת להם רחמים--על זקן הכבדת עלך מאד
word.hebrewmodern: קצפתי על עמי חללתי נחלתי ואתנם בידך לא שמת להם רחמים על זקן הכבדת עלך מאד׃
word.greekot: παρωξύνθην ἐπὶ τῷ λαῷ μου ἐμίανας τὴν κληρονομίαν μου ἐγὼ ἔδωκα εἰς τὴν χεῖρά σου σὺ δὲ οὐκ ἔδωκας αὐτοῖς ἔλεος τοῦ πρεσβυτέρου ἐβάρυνας τὸν ζυγὸν σφόδρα

word.kjv: They shall not hunger nor thirst; neither shall the heat nor sun smite them: for he that hath mercy on them shall lead them, even by the springs of water shall he guide them.
word.thailand: เขาทั้งหลายจะไม่หิวหรือกระหาย ความร้อนหรือดวงอาทิตย์จะไม่ทำลายเขา เพราะพระองค์ซึ่งเมตตาเขาจะทรงนำเขาไป และจะนำเขาไปตามน้ำพุ
word.spanish1909: No tendrán hambre ni sed, ni el calor ni el sol los afligirá; porque el que tiene de ellos misericordia los guiará, y los conducirá á manaderos de aguas.
word.latinvulgate: Non esurient neque sitient, et non percutiet eos æstus et sol, quia miserator eorum reget eos, et ad fontes aquarum potabit eos.
word.italian1927: non avranno fame né sete, né miraggio né sole li colpirà più; poiché Colui che ha pietà di loro li guiderà, e li menerà alle sorgenti d’acqua.
word.german1912: Sie werden weder hungern noch dürsten, sie wird keine Hitze noch Sonne stechen, denn ihr Erbarmer wird sie führen und wird sie an die Wasserquellen leiten.
word.french1910: Ils n'auront pas faim et ils n'auront pas soif; Le mirage et le soleil ne les feront point souffrir; Car celui qui a pitié d'eux sera leur guide, Et il les conduira vers des sources d'eaux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們必不飢餓，也不口渴，炎熱和太陽必不傷害他們，因為那憐憫他們的，要引領他們，帶領他們到水泉的旁邊。
word.korean: 그들이 주리거나 목마르지 아니할 것이며 더위와 볕이 그들을 상하지 아니하리니 이는 그들을 긍휼히 여기는 자가 그들을 이끌되 샘물 근원으로 인도할 것임이니라
word.tagalog: Sila'y hindi mangagugutom, o mangauuhaw man; at hindi man sila mangapapaso ng init, o ng araw man: sapagka't siyang may awa sa kanila ay papatnubay sa kanila, sa makatuwid baga'y sa tabi ng mga bukal ng tubig ay papatnubayan niya sila.
word.maori: E kore ratou e matekai, e kore ano e matewai, e kore hoki te werawera, te ra ranei, e pakakinakina ki a ratou; no te mea ko to ratou kaiatawhai hei arahi i a ratou; mana hoki ratou e arahi ki nga puna wai.
word.cebuano: Sila dili pagagutomon ni pagauhawon; ni ang kainit ni ang adlaw mohampak kanila: kay siya nga adunay kalooy kanila magamando kanila, bisan ubay sa kasapaan sa tubig siya magamando kanila.
word.hebrew: י לא ירעבו ולא יצמאו ולא יכם שרב ושמש  כי מרחמם ינהגם ועל מבועי מים ינהלם
word.hebrewmodern: לא ירעבו ולא יצמאו ולא יכם שרב ושמש כי מרחמם ינהגם ועל מבועי מים ינהלם׃
word.greekot: οὐ πεινάσουσιν οὐδὲ διψήσουσιν οὐδὲ πατάξει αὐτοὺς καύσων οὐδὲ ὁ ἥλιος ἀλλὰ ὁ ἐλεῶν αὐτοὺς παρακαλέσει καὶ διὰ πηγῶν ὑδάτων ἄξει αὐτούς

word.kjv: Sing, O heavens; and be joyful, O earth; and break forth into singing, O mountains: for the LORD hath comforted his people, and will have mercy upon his afflicted.
word.thailand: โอ ฟ้าสวรรค์เอ๋ย จงร้องเพลง โอ แผ่นดินโลกเอ๋ย จงลิงโลดเถิด โอ ภูเขาเอ๋ย จงเปรมปรีดิ์ร้องเพลง เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ทรงเล้าโลมชนชาติของพระองค์แล้ว และจะทรงเมตตาแก่คนของพระองค์ ผู้ที่ถูกข่มใจ
word.spanish1909: Cantad alabanzas, oh cielos, y alégrate, tierra; y prorrumpid en alabanzas, oh montes: porque Jehová ha consolado su pueblo, y de sus pobres tendrá misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate, cæli, et exsulta, terra ; jubilate, montes, laudem, quia consolatus est Dominus populum suum, et pauperum suorum miserebitur.
word.italian1927: Giubilate, o cieli, e tu, terra, festeggia! Date in gridi di gioia, o monti, poiché l’Eterno consola il suo popolo, ed ha pietà de’ suoi afflitti.
word.german1912: Jauchzet, ihr Himmel, freue dich, Erde, lobet, ihr Berge, mit Jauchzen; denn der HERR hat sein Volk getröstet und erbarmt sich seiner Elenden.
word.french1910: Cieux, réjouissez-vous! Terre, sois dans l'allégresse! Montagnes, éclatez en cris de joie! Car l'Eternel console son peuple, Il a pitié de ses malheureux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 諸天哪！你們要歡呼。大地啊！你當快樂。眾山啊！你們要發聲歡呼。因為耶和華已經安慰了他的子民，也必憐憫他受困苦的人。
word.korean: 하늘이여 ! 노래하라 땅이여 ! 기뻐하라 산들이여 ! 즐거이 노래하라 여호와가 그 백성을 위로하였은즉 그 고난 당한 자를 긍휼히 여길 것임이니라
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay umawit, Oh langit; at magalak, Oh lupa; at kayo'y biglang magsiawit, Oh mga bundok: sapagka't inaliw ng Panginoon ang kaniyang bayan, at mahahabag sa kaniyang nagdadalamhati.
word.maori: ¶ Waiata, e nga rangi; kia hari hoki, e te whenua; kia pakaru mai ta koutou waiata, e nga maunga: ka whakamarie hoki a Ihowa i tana iwi, ka aroha hoki ki ana kua tukinotia nei.
word.cebuano: Panag-awit, Oh mga langit; ug pagmalipayon, Oh yuta; ug humunat sa pag-awit, Oh mga bukid: kay nagalipay si Jehova sa iyang katawohan, ug adunay kalooy sa iyang ginasakit.
word.hebrew: יג רנו שמים וגילי ארץ יפצחו (ופצחו) הרים רנה  כי נחם יהוה עמו וענייו ירחם  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: רנו שמים וגילי ארץ יפצחו הרים רנה כי נחם יהוה עמו ועניו ירחם׃
word.greekot: εὐφραίνεσθε οὐρανοί καὶ ἀγαλλιάσθω ἡ γῆ ῥηξάτωσαν τὰ ὄρη εὐφροσύνην καὶ οἱ βουνοὶ δικαιοσύνην ὅτι ἠλέησεν ὁ θεὸς τὸν λαὸν αὐτοῦ καὶ τοὺς ταπεινοὺς τοῦ λαοῦ αὐτοῦ παρεκάλεσεν

word.kjv: In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the LORD thy Redeemer.
word.thailand: เราได้ซ่อนหน้าของเราจากเจ้า ด้วยความพิโรธอันท่วมท้นอยู่ครู่หนึ่ง แต่ด้วยความกรุณานิรันดร์ เราจะมีความเมตตาต่อเจ้า" พระเยโฮวาห์พระผู้ไถ่เจ้าตรัสดังนี้
word.spanish1909: Con un poco de ira escondí mi rostro de ti por un momento; mas con misericordia eterna tendré compasión de ti, dijo tu Redentor Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: In momento indignationis abscondi faciem meam parumper a te ; et in misericordia sempiterna misertus sum tui, dixit redemptor tuus, Dominus.
word.italian1927: In un accesso d’ira, t’ho per un momento nascosta la mia faccia, ma con un amore eterno io avrò pietà di te, dice l’Eterno, il tuo redentore.
word.german1912: Ich habe mein Angesicht im Augenblick des Zorns ein wenig vor dir verborgen, aber mit ewiger Gnade will ich mich dein erbarmen, spricht der HERR, dein Erlöser.
word.french1910: Dans un instant de colère, je t'avais un moment dérobé ma face, Mais avec un amour éternel j'aurai compassion de toi, Dit ton rédempteur, l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在怒氣漲溢的時候，我暫時向你掩面，卻要以永遠的慈愛憐憫你；這是耶和華你的救贖主說的。
word.korean: 내가 넘치는 진노로 내 얼굴을 네게서 잠시 가리웠으나 영원한 자비로 너를 긍휼히 여기리라 네 구속자 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: Sa kaunting pagiinit ay ikinubli ko ang aking mukha sa iyo sa isang sangdali; nguni't kinaawaan kita sa pamamagitan ng walang hanggang kagandahang-loob, sabi ng Panginoon, na iyong Manunubos.
word.maori: He riri puhake, i huna ahau i toku kanohi i a koe, he wahi iti; he aroha mau tonu ia toku e aroha ai ki a koe, e ai ta Ihowa, ta tou kaiwhakaora.
word.cebuano: Sa nagaawas nga kasuko gitagoan ko ang akong nawong gikan kanimo sa usa lamang ka daklit nga panahon; apan uban sa walay katapusan nga mahigugmaong-kalolot, pagakaloy-an ko ikaw, nagaingon si Jehova nga imong Manunubos.
word.hebrew: ח בשצף קצף הסתרתי פני רגע ממך ובחסד עולם רחמתיך--אמר גאלך יהוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: בשצף קצף הסתרתי פני רגע ממך ובחסד עולם רחמתיך אמר גאלך יהוה׃
word.greekot: ἐν θυμῷ μικρῷ ἀπέστρεψα τὸ πρόσωπόν μου ἀπὸ σοῦ καὶ ἐν ἐλέει αἰωνίῳ ἐλεήσω σε εἶπεν ὁ ῥυσάμενός σε κύριος

word.kjv: For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my kindness shall not depart from thee, neither shall the covenant of my peace be removed, saith the LORD that hath mercy on thee.
word.thailand: เพราะภูเขาจะพรากจากไป และเนินจะคลอนแคลน แต่ความกรุณาของเราจะไม่พรากไปจากเจ้า และพันธสัญญาแห่งสันติภาพของเราจะไม่คลอนแคลนไป" พระเยโฮวาห์ผู้มีความเมตตาต่อเจ้าตรัสดังนี้
word.spanish1909: Porque los montes se moverán, y los collados temblarán; mas no se apartará de ti mi misericordia, ni el pacto de mi paz vacilará, dijo Jehová, el que tiene misericordia de ti.
word.latinvulgate: Montes enim commovebuntur, et colles contremiscent ; misericordia autem mea non recedet a te, et fœdus pacis meæ non movebitur, dixit miserator tuus Dominus.
word.italian1927: Quand’anche i monti s’allontanassero e i colli fossero rimossi, l’amor mio non s’allontanerà da te, né il mio patto di pace sarà rimosso, dice l’Eterno, che ha pietà di te.
word.german1912: Denn es sollen wohl Berge weichen und Hügel hinfallen; aber meine Gnade soll nicht von dir weichen, und der Bund meines Friedens soll nicht hinfallen, spricht der HERR, dein Erbarmer.
word.french1910: Quand les montagnes s'éloigneraient, Quand les collines chancelleraient, Mon amour ne s'éloignera point de toi, Et mon alliance de paix ne chancellera point, Dit l'Eternel, qui a compassion de toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雖然大山可以挪開，小山可以遷移，但我的慈愛必不從你身上挪開，我和平的約也必不遷移；這是憐憫你的耶和華說的。
word.korean: 산들은 떠나며 작은 산들은 옮길지라도 나의 인자는 네게서 떠나지 아니하며 화평케 하는 나의 언약은 옮기지 아니하리라 너를 긍휼히 여기는 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang mga bundok ay mangapapaalis, at ang mga burol ay mangapapalipat; nguni't ang aking kagandahang-loob ay hindi hihiwalay sa iyo, o ang akin mang tipan ng kapayapaan ay maalis, sabi ng Panginoon na naaawa sa iyo.
word.maori: Ko nga maunga hoki ka riro ke, ko nga pukepuke ka nekehia atu; tena ko toku aroha e kore e rere ke i a koe, e kore ano e nekehia ketia te kawenata e mau ai taku rongo; e ai ta Ihowa e atawhai nei i a koe.
word.cebuano: Kay ang mga bukid kaha mapapha, ug ang mga bungtod mabalhin; apan ang mahigugmaong-kalolot dili mobulag kanimo, ni ang akong tugon sa pakigdait mabalhin, nagaingon si Jehova nga adunay kalooy kanimo.
word.hebrew: י כי ההרים ימושו והגבעות תמוטינה--וחסדי מאתך לא ימוש וברית שלומי לא תמוט אמר מרחמך יהוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כי ההרים ימושו והגבעות תמוטנה וחסדי מאתך לא ימוש וברית שלומי לא תמוט אמר מרחמך יהוה׃
word.greekot: τὰ ὄρη μεταστήσεσθαι οὐδὲ οἱ βουνοί σου μετακινηθήσονται οὕτως οὐδὲ τὸ παρ' ἐμοῦ σοι ἔλεος ἐκλείψει οὐδὲ ἡ διαθήκη τῆς εἰρήνης σου οὐ μὴ μεταστῇ εἶπεν γὰρ κύριος ἵλεώς σοι

word.kjv: Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the LORD, and he will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.
word.thailand: ให้คนชั่วละทิ้งทางของเขา และคนไม่ชอบธรรมสละความคิดของเขา ให้เขากลับยังพระเยโฮวาห์ เพื่อพระองค์จะทรงเมตตาเขา และยังพระเจ้าของเรา เพราะพระองค์จะทรงอภัยอย่างล้นเหลือ
word.spanish1909: Deje el impío su camino, y el hombre inicuo sus pensamientos; y vuélvase á Jehová, el cual tendrá de él misericordia, y al Dios nuestro, el cual será amplio en perdonar.
word.latinvulgate: Derelinquat impius viam suam, et vir iniquus cogitationes suas, et revertatur ad Dominum, et miserebitur ejus ; et ad Deum nostrum, quoniam multus est ad ignoscendum.
word.italian1927: Lasci l’empio la sua via, e l’uomo iniquo i suoi pensieri: e si converta all’Eterno che avrà pietà di lui, e al nostro Dio ch’è largo nel perdonare.
word.german1912: Der Gottlose lasse von seinem Wege und der Übeltäter seine Gedanken und bekehre sich zum HERRN, so wird er sich sein erbarmen, und zu unserm Gott, denn bei ihm ist viel Vergebung.
word.french1910: Que le méchant abandonne sa voie, Et l'homme d'iniquité ses pensées; Qu'il retourne à l'Eternel, qui aura pitié de lui, A notre Dieu, qui ne se lasse pas de pardonner.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人要離棄自己的道路，不義的人當除去自己的意念，回轉過來歸向耶和華，耶和華就必憐憫他。你們當回轉過來歸向我們的　神，因為他大大赦免人的罪。
word.korean: 악인은 그 길을, 불의한 자는 그 생각을 버리고 여호와께로 돌아오라 그리하면 그가 긍휼히 여기시리라 우리 하나님께로 나아오라 그가 널리 용서하시리라
word.tagalog: Lisanin ng masama ang kaniyang lakad, at ng liko ang kaniyang mga pagiisip; at manumbalik siya sa Panginoon, at kaaawaan niya siya; at sa aming Dios, sapagka't siya'y magpapatawad ng sagana.
word.maori: Kia whakarere te tangata kino i tona ara, te tangata mahi he i ona whakaaro; kia hoki ki a Ihowa, a ka aroha ia ki a ia; ki to tatou Atua hoki, he nui rawa hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Pabiyai sa dautan ang iyang dalan, ug sa tawo nga dili matarung ang iyang mga hunahuna; ug pabalika siya kang Jehova, ug siya malooy kaniya; ug sa atong Dios, kay siya mopasaylo sa madagayaon gayud.
word.hebrew: ז יעזב רשע דרכו ואיש און מחשבתיו וישב אל יהוה וירחמהו ואל אלהינו כי ירבה לסלוח
word.hebrewmodern: יעזב רשע דרכו ואיש און מחשבתיו וישב אל יהוה וירחמהו ואל אלהינו כי ירבה לסלוח׃
word.greekot: ἀπολιπέτω ὁ ἀσεβὴς τὰς ὁδοὺς αὐτοῦ καὶ ἀνὴρ ἄνομος τὰς βουλὰς αὐτοῦ καὶ ἐπιστραφήτω ἐπὶ κύριον καὶ ἐλεηθήσεται ὅτι ἐπὶ πολὺ ἀφήσει τὰς ἁμαρτίας ὑμῶν

word.kjv: And the sons of strangers shall build up thy walls, and their kings shall minister unto thee: for in my wrath I smote thee, but in my favour have I had mercy on thee.
word.thailand: เหล่าบุตรชายของคนต่างด้าวจะสร้างกำแพงของเจ้าขึ้น และกษัตริย์ของเขาจะปรนนิบัติเจ้า เพราะด้วยความพิโรธของเรา เราเฆี่ยนเจ้า แต่ด้วยความโปรดปรานของเรา เราได้กรุณาเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Y los hijos de los extranjeros edificarán tus muros, y sus reyes te servirán; porque en mi ira te herí, mas en mi buena voluntad tendré de ti misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Et ædificabunt filii peregrinorum muros tuos, et reges eorum ministrabunt tibi ; in indignatione enim mea percussi te, et in reconciliatione mea misertus sum tui.
word.italian1927: I figli dello straniero ricostruiranno le tue mura, e i loro re saranno al tuo servizio; poiché io t’ho colpita nel mio sdegno, ma nella mia benevolenza ha avuto pietà di te.
word.german1912: Fremde werden deine Mauern bauen, und ihre Könige werden dir dienen. Denn in meinem Zorn habe ich dich geschlagen, und in meiner Gnade erbarme ich mich über dich.
word.french1910: Les fils de l'étranger rebâtiront tes murs, Et leurs rois seront tes serviteurs; Car je t'ai frappée dans ma colère, Mais dans ma miséricorde j'ai pitié de toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 萬民必歸向　神外族人要重建你的城牆，他們的君王都必服事你。雖然我曾經在烈怒中擊打了你，現在我卻在恩典中憐憫你。
word.korean: 내가 노하여 너를 쳤으나 이제는 나의 은혜로 너를 긍휼히 여겼은즉 이방인들이 네 성벽을 쌓을 것이요 그 왕들이 너를 봉사할 것이며
word.tagalog: At itatayo ng mga taga ibang lupa ang iyong mga kuta, at ang kanilang mga hari ay magsisipangasiwa sa iyo: sapagka't sa aking poot ay sinaktan kita, nguni't sa aking biyaya ay naawa ako sa iyo.
word.maori: Ka hanga ano ou taiepa e nga tangata ke, ko o ratou kingi ano hei kaimahi mau: he riri hoki noku i patu ai ahau i a koe, he manako ia naku i atawhai ai ahau i a koe.
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga lumalangyaw maoy motukod sa imong mga kuta, ug ang ilang mga hari maoy moalagad kanimo: kay tungod sa akong kaligutgut gisamaran ko ikaw, apan tungod sa akong maayong kabubut-on ginakaloy-an ko ikaw.
word.hebrew: י ובנו בני נכר חמתיך ומלכיהם ישרתונך  כי בקצפי הכיתיך וברצוני רחמתיך
word.hebrewmodern: ובנו בני נכר חמתיך ומלכיהם ישרתונך כי בקצפי הכיתיך וברצוני רחמתיך׃
word.greekot: καὶ οἰκοδομήσουσιν ἀλλογενεῖς τὰ τείχη σου καὶ οἱ βασιλεῖς αὐτῶν παραστήσονταί σοι διὰ γὰρ ὀργήν μου ἐπάταξά σε καὶ διὰ ἔλεον ἠγάπησά σε

word.kjv: They shall lay hold on bow and spear; they are cruel, and have no mercy; their voice roareth like the sea; and they ride upon horses, set in array as men for war against thee, O daughter of Zion.
word.thailand: เขาทั้งหลายจะจับคันธนูและหอก เขาทั้งหลายดุร้ายและไม่มีความสงสาร เสียงของเขาก็เหมือนเสียงทะเลกำเริบ เขาทั้งหลายขี่ม้า และจัดเตรียมกระบวนเหมือนชายที่จะเข้าสงคราม บุตรสาวศิโยนเอ๋ย เขาทั้งหลายมาต่อสู้เจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Arco y escudo arrebatarán; crueles son, que no tendrán misericordia; sonará la voz de ellos como la mar, y montarán á caballo como hombres dispuestos para la guerra, contra ti, oh hija de Sión.
word.latinvulgate: Sagittam et scutum arripiet : crudelis est et non miserebitur : vox ejus quasi mare sonabit : et super equos ascendent, præparati quasi vir ad prælium adversum te, filia Sion.
word.italian1927: Essi impugnano l’arco ed il dardo; son crudeli, non hanno pietà; la loro voce è come il muggito del mare; montan cavalli; son pronti a combattere come un solo guerriero, contro di te, o figliuola di Sion.
word.german1912: die Bogen und Lanze führen. Es ist grausam und ohne Barmherzigkeit; sie brausen daher wie ein ungestümes Meer und reiten auf Rossen, gerüstet wie Kriegsleute, wider dich, du Tochter Zion.
word.french1910: Ils portent l'arc et le javelot; Ils sont cruels, sans miséricorde; Leur voix mugit comme la mer; Ils sont montés sur des chevaux, Prêts à combattre comme un seul homme, Contre toi, fille de Sion!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們緊握弓和槍，性情殘忍，毫無憐憫；他們的聲音像海洋怒吼；錫安的居民（“居民”原文作“女子”）哪！他們騎著戰馬，在戰場上如同一人，列陣攻擊你們。”
word.korean: 그들은 활과 창을 잡았고 잔인하여 자비가 없으며 그 목소리는 바다가 흉용함 같은 자라 그들이 말을 타고 전사 같이 다 항오를벌이고 딸 시온 너를 치려하느니라 하시도다
word.tagalog: Sila'y nagsisihawak ng busog at ng sibat; sila'y mabagsik at walang habag; ang kanilang tinig ay humuhugong na parang dagat, at sila'y nagsisisakay sa mga kabayo, bawa't isa ay humahanay, na parang isang lalake sa pakikipagbaka, laban sa iyo Oh anak na babae ng Sion.
word.maori: Ka mau ratou ki te kopere, ki te tao; he nanakia ratou, e kore hoki e tohu tangata; ko to ratou reo, ano kei te moana e haruru ana, a eke ai ratou i runga i te hoiho; rarangi rawa ratou, me te mea he tangata e mea ana ki te whawhai ki a koe, e t e tamahine a Hiona.
word.cebuano: Sila managbitbit ug mga pana ug bangkaw; sila mabangis man ug walay kalooy; ang ilang tingog modahunog sama sa dagat; ug sila mangabayo sa mga kabayo, ang tagsatagsa magalaray, sama sa usa ka tawo, nga andam sa gubat batok kaninyo, Oh anak nga babaye sa Sion.
word.hebrew: כג קשת וכידון יחזיקו אכזרי הוא ולא ירחמו קולם כים יהמה ועל סוסים ירכבו ערוך כאיש למלחמה עליך בת ציון
word.hebrewmodern: קשת וכידון יחזיקו אכזרי הוא ולא ירחמו קולם כים יהמה ועל סוסים ירכבו ערוך כאיש למלחמה עליך בת ציון׃
word.greekot: τόξον καὶ ζιβύνην κρατήσουσιν ἰταμός ἐστιν καὶ οὐκ ἐλεήσει φωνὴ αὐτοῦ ὡς θάλασσα κυμαίνουσα ἐφ' ἵπποις καὶ ἅρμασιν παρατάξεται ὡς πῦρ εἰς πόλεμον πρὸς σέ θύγατερ σιων

word.kjv: And I will dash them one against another, even the fathers and the sons together, saith the LORD: I will not pity, nor spare, nor have mercy, but destroy them.
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสว่า เราจะเหวี่ยงเขาทั้งหลายให้ชนกันและกัน พวกพ่อก็ชนพวกลูก เราจะไม่สงสาร หรือไม่ไว้ชีวิต หรือไม่เมตตา แต่เราจะทำลายเขา"
word.spanish1909: Y quebrantarélos el uno con el otro, los padres con los hijos juntamente, dice Jehová: no perdonaré, ni tendré piedad ni misericordia, para no destruirlos.
word.latinvulgate: Et dispergam eos virum a fratre suo, et patres et filios pariter, ait Dominus. Non parcam, et non concedam : neque miserebor, ut non disperdam eos.
word.italian1927: Li sbatterò l’uno contro l’altro, padri e figli assieme, dice l’Eterno; io non risparmierò alcuno; nessuna pietà, nessuna compassione m’impedirà di distruggerli.
word.german1912: und will einen mit dem andern, die Väter samt den Kindern, verstreuen, spricht der HERR; und will weder schonen noch übersehen noch barmherzig sein über ihrem Verderben.
word.french1910: Je les briserai les uns contre les autres, Les pères et les fils ensemble, dit l'Eternel; Je n'épargnerai pas, je n'aurai point de pitié, point de miséricorde, Rien ne m'empêchera de les détruire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要使他們彼此碰撞，連父子也要互相碰撞；我必不愛惜、不可憐，也不憐憫他們，我必把他們滅絕。’”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 또 그들로 피차 충돌하여 상하게 하되 부자간에도 그러하게 할 것이라 내가 그들을 불쌍히 여기지 아니하며 관용치 아니하며 아끼지 아니하고 멸하리라 하셨다 하라 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: At aking itutulak ang isa laban sa isa, sa makatuwid baga'y ang mga magulang at ang mga anak na magkakasama, sabi ng Panginoon: hindi ako magpapatawad, o maaawa man, o mahahabag man, na sila'y lilipulin ko.
word.maori: Ka akina atu ano ratou e ahau tetahi ki tetahi, nga matua ngatahi ano ko nga tamariki, e ai ta Ihowa; e kore e tohungia e ahau, e kore e manawapatia, e kore e arohaina, kia kore ai ratou e ngaro i ahau.
word.cebuano: Ug ipusdak ko ang usa batok sa usa kanila, bisan ang mga amahan ug mga anak, nagaingon si Jehova: ako dili malooy kanila , ni mopagawas kanila , ni magabaton ug kahinuklog kanila ; sa pagkaagi nga dili ko laglagon sila.
word.hebrew: יד ונפצתים איש אל אחיו והאבות והבנים יחדו--נאם יהוה לא אחמול ולא אחוס ולא ארחם מהשחיתם
word.hebrewmodern: ונפצתים איש אל אחיו והאבות והבנים יחדו נאם יהוה לא אחמול ולא אחוס ולא ארחם מהשחיתם׃
word.greekot: καὶ διασκορπιῶ αὐτοὺς ἄνδρα καὶ τὸν ἀδελφὸν αὐτοῦ καὶ τοὺς πατέρας αὐτῶν καὶ τοὺς υἱοὺς αὐτῶν ἐν τῷ αὐτῷ οὐκ ἐπιποθήσω λέγει κύριος καὶ οὐ φείσομαι καὶ οὐκ οἰκτιρήσω ἀπὸ διαφθορᾶς αὐτῶν

word.kjv: And afterward, saith the LORD, I will deliver Zedekiah king of Judah, and his servants, and the people, and such as are left in this city from the pestilence, from the sword, and from the famine, into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those that seek their life: and he shall smite them with the edge of the sword; he shall not spare them, neither have pity, nor have mercy.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสว่า ภายหลังเราจะมอบเศเดคียาห์กษัตริย์ของยูดาห์ และบรรดาข้าราชการของเขา และประชาชนเมืองนี้ซึ่งรอดตายจากโรคระบาด ดาบและการกันดารอาหารไว้ในมือของเนบูคัดเนสซาร์กษัตริย์แห่งบาบิโลน และมอบไว้ในมือของศัตรูของเขาทั้งหลาย ในมือของคนเหล่านั้นที่แสวงหาชีวิตของเขา ท่านจะฟันเขาเสียด้วยคมดาบ ท่านจะไม่สงสารเขาทั้งหลาย หรือไว้ชีวิตเขา หรือมีความเมตตาต่อเขา'
word.spanish1909: Y después, así dice Jehová, entregaré á Sedechîas rey de Judá, y á sus criados, y al pueblo, y á los que quedaren en la ciudad de la pestilencia, y del cuchillo, y del hambre, en mano de Nabucodonosor rey de Babilonia, y en mano de sus enemigos, y en mano
word.latinvulgate: Et post hæc ait Dominus : Dabo Sedeciam, regem Juda, et servos ejus, et populum ejus, et qui derelicti sunt in civitate hac a peste, et gladio, et fame, in manu Nabuchodonosor regis Babylonis, et in manu inimicorum eorum, et in manu quærentium animam eorum : et percutiet eos in ore gladii, et non flectetur neque parcet, nec miserebitur.
word.italian1927: Poi, dice l’Eterno, io darò Sedechia, re di Giuda, e i suoi servi, il popolo, e coloro che in questa città saranno scampati dalla peste, dalla spada e dalla fame, in mano di Nebucadnetsar re di Babilonia, in mano dei loro nemici, in mano di quelli che cercano la loro vita; e Nebucadnetsar li passerà a fil di spada; non li risparmierà, e non ne avrà né pietà né compassione.
word.german1912: Und darnach, spricht der HERR, will ich Zedekia, den König Juda's, samt seinen Knechten und dem Volk, das in dieser Stadt vor der Pestilenz, vor Schwert und Hunger übrigbleiben wird, geben in die Hände Nebukadnezars, des Königs zu Babel, und in die Hände ihrer Feinde, und in die Hände derer, die ihnen nach dem Leben stehen, daß er sie mit der Schärfe des Schwerts also schlage, daß kein Schonen noch Gnade noch Barmherzigkeit da sei.
word.french1910: Après cela, dit l'Eternel, je livrerai Sédécias, roi de Juda, ses serviteurs, le peuple, et ceux qui dans cette ville échapperont à la peste, à l'épée et à la famine, je les livrerai entre les mains de Nebucadnetsar, roi de Babylone, entre les mains de leurs ennemis, entre les mains de ceux qui en veulent à leur vie; et Nebucadnetsar les frappera du tranchant de l'épée, il ne les épargnera pas, il n'aura point de pitié, point de compassion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然後，我必把猶大王西底家和他的臣民，就是在這城裡經過瘟疫、刀劍之災和饑荒而倖存的人，都交在巴比倫王尼布甲尼撒和他們的仇敵，以及尋索他們性命的人的手中。尼布甲尼撒要用刀劍擊殺他們，絕不顧惜，不留情，不憐憫。’”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 여호와께서 또 말씀하시되 그 후에 내가 유다 왕 시드기야와 그 신하들과 백성과 및 이 성읍에서 염병과 칼과 기근에서 남은 자를 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살의 손과 그 대적의 손과 그 생명을 찾는 자들의 손에 붙이리니 그가 칼날로 그들을 치되 아끼지 아니하며 긍휼히 여기지 아니하며 불쌍히 여기지 아니하리라 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: At pagkatapos, sabi ng Panginoon, aking ibibigay si Sedechias na hari sa Juda, at ang kaniyang mga lingkod, at ang bayan, at yaong nangaiwan sa bayang ito na mula sa pagkasalot, mula sa tabak, at mula sa gutom, sa kamay ni Nabucodonosor na hari sa Babilonia, at sa kamay ng kanilang mga kaaway, at sa kamay ng nagsisiusig ng kanilang buhay: at kaniyang susugatan sila ng talim ng tabak; hindi niya patatawarin sila, o panghihinayangan man, o kaaawaan man.
word.maori: Na, muri iho, e ai ta Ihowa, ka hoatu e ahau a Terekia kingi o Hura ratou ko ana tangata, ko te iwi, ara ko te hunga o tenei pa e toe i te mate uruta, i te hoari, i te hemokai, ki te ringa o Nepukareha kingi o Papurona, ki te ringa o o ratou hoa whawhai, ki te ringa hoki o te hunga e whai ana kia whakamatea ratou: a ka patua ratou e ia ki te mata o te hoari; e kore ratou e tohungia e ia, e kore e manawapatia, e kore e arohaina.
